description:
Add a bit of history to your vacation or work-trip by staying in the old Columbus candy and EJ Thomas factory!

Redeveloped in 2019, the space features exposed brick walls, new appliances, white granite counters, with common areas featuring original timber beams from the historic factory!

Add in the prime location with a short walk to Budd Dairy Food-Hall, Seventth Son Brewery, or Fox in the Snow cafe, and the flat will make for the perfect trip, whether it be for work or play!

The space
The space is a 1 bedroom flat in the old Columbus candy & EJ Thomas factory.

neighborhood_overview: We are located right in the heart of The Ohio State University campus which makes for a great central location throughout Columbus. The space is located in dugout basement of a late 1800's Victorian manor. My wife loves it because it is the best running neighborhood. Simply put, I could live anywhere in the city and I choose to live here.

description:
This beautiful 1-bedroom getaway will make you feel right at home in the Art and Soul of Columbus, the Short North. Steps away from the heart of all the best restaurants, bars, and shops, but just far enough away for peace & quiet.
Take a morning walk down to High St for some bagels at The Lox, and continue on to the scenic Goodale Park for a relaxing picnic. With a king-size bed, large desk, full kitchen, off-street parking, and abundant greenery, our home will make for a delightful stay!

The space

Enjoy local coffee shops just a couple blocks away, or grab a bite to eat at one of the dozens of restaurants within a 5min walk of this gem.

name: Spacious newly-renovated Downtown Columbus home
description:
Whether you're on a business trip, are temporarily relocating, or just taking a long vacation, you've found your home away from home. Our large two bedroom, one bath duplex unit is located in a quaint Downtown Columbus neighborhood, Olde Towne East. Walking distance or a quick Uber ride to many restaurants, bars, shops, and entertainment, we are accessible to it all. Work from home or at one of our partner coworking spaces nearby. Need concierge services? Personal assistants are a call away.

The space
Our mid-century modern unit was designed with business travelers in mind. The oversized main bedroom includes a brand new memory foam Queen mattress, double-entry closet, and attached office space. The second room can be transformed into a reading room, yoga/fitness studio, or a full-size bedroom if needed. Get some fresh air in the private backyard, perfect for alone time or entertaining. Street parking in the front is available. The unit is fully equipped with a w
neighborhood_overview: Olde Towne East is a neighborhood located in the historical Near East Side of Columbus, Ohio and is one of Columbus' oldest neighborhoods. One block away you will find a few local hang-outs and eateries to include Yellowbrick Pizza, Olde Towne Tavern, Lifestyle Cafe (Vegan), Camelot Cellars (Winery) and Our Bar & Lounge. A few blocks further you will find my daily coffee shop, Upper Cup Coffee; a breakfast favorite, Hangover Easy; brunch and cocktails at Olde Oak and the perfect patio at Germut Biergarten. All in walking distance! There are also a handful of great shops, gardens and parks in the area.

host_about:
Real estate investor out of Columbus, OH who loves traveling and seeing new places. Love spending time on the beach and trying new restaurants. Love watching football and basketball and getting into the gym. Like to read every morning as well.

There is space for an air mattress on the 3rd floor as
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood Franklinton is situated just west of Downtown Columbus, and is full of historic homes. This neighborhood has experienced many phases through out it's existence, and is currently in a revitalization phase. There are lots of properties being renovated, and some that still remain boarded and empty. This area has experienced some crime in the past, but has improved in recent years.

Franklinton has experienced several great floods in the past, and has been somewhat neglected throughout the middle to late part of the 1900's. The Franklinton Floodwall, completed in 2004, is 7 miles long, cost $134 million. The wall's completion has released the area from being considered a floodplain, as well as releasing the previous building restrictions that often prevented development in the past. As a result, commercial and industrial activities are starting to grow in the Franklinton Area.

name: The Goodale Park Studio | Short North Arts District
description:
Enjoy your stay at this cozy studio, tucked into a small residential building along Goodale Park. The studio features a private outside entrance with a keypad lock and is easily walkable to some of the city's best restaurants and entertainment. Walk to the convention center in 10 minutes! Street parking available for an additional $3/night. The studio is in a vintage building with neighbors upstairs - not a great fit for light sleepers or for noisy groups.

The space
This is a recently updated studio apartment on the "garden" level of a small residential building (you will enter from ground level and go down half a flight of stairs to the apartment).

*****

The studio features a queen bed and a fold-down futon which can sleep two additional guests. The TV has a cable connection (but it is not a "smart" TV for streaming your own content). The kitchen has basic appliances and cookware - pots, pans, plates, bowls, silverware, glasses, toas
neighborhood_overview: The Short North is home to some of the best restaurants, shopping, art galleries, and night life in the city.  This neighborhood draws a healthy blend of graduate students, young professionals, and families.  Goodale Park is right across the street and is home to ComFest, summer concert series, tennis courts, and some really big trees.  The building is also along the route for the Cap City Half Marathon, the Columbus Marathon, the Pride Parade, and the Doo Dah parade!
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: Quiet Hotel Stay II  in the Indie Art Capital 159
description:
Two Full Bed, Non-Smoking, Free Breakfast, WiFi, OTA TV, 24 Hour Reception. Daily Housekeeping. Your room charge will be paid prior to your arrival. The remaining balance of taxes (10% City Tax, 7.5% County Tax) will be charged upon arrival. Hotel is located at I-71 and SR-161 junction with easy access to Polaris Fashion Centre (5 mi), Down Town (10 mi), OSU airport (4 mi). Columbus Zoo is just 20 min drive. Zaftig Brewing and Anheuser-Busch are in biking distance.

The space
Due to Covid-19, breakfast is grab and go. We provide individually wrapped pastries and you also have the option to make various varieties of coffee. Plenty of parking space available for large pickup or van with trailers.

License number
2020-1964
neighborhood_overview: Two night clubs are in walking distance -- Spain Night Club and Delfin Night Life. There is Stars Indoor Sports nearby in The Continent. Eatery in walking distance (5min or less): Bob Evans, Waffle House, Wendy's, Skyline Chili, Subway, Helen's Asian Kitchen, Sermat African, China Jade, Twist Lounge and Grill, and 10Nineteen. A little further out: Tim Horton's, Pizza Hut and Domino's Pizza.
host_about:
Hi This is Leigh

We have excellent WiFi networks, 2.4 Ghz and 5 GHz, and use them to view programs over internet.

The apartment building uses smart door locks and door codes with RFID tags to simplify access.  No key needed or enter codes, once you started using tags.  The apartment smart lock access code is changed after each guest leaves.
While my apartment is not fancy, I stride for a clean and to create a low allergen environment for my guests.

name: Brand New Downtown Columbus condo with a view- 516
description:
Welcome to our newest Columbus urban environment apartment community.
With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location. Perfect for a weekend away or business travel, this property will not disappoint. Here at Harlow your location is your biggest amenity!
We made a list of the urban hotspots that are steps from your front door!
The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.
Also, a short distance to Columbus Commons which is a six-acre park set within the scenic Downtown skyline.
Children’s Hospital - 1.4 miles
Columbus State Community College - 1.2 miles
Amenities within our property:
Secure building access, bike storage, community-wide Wi-Fi, and a coffee bar are just a few of the additional amenities Harlow offers.
We offer covered off-street parking with elevator access, 24-hour
neighborhood_overview:
We are excited to introduce Columbus’ newest apartment community Harlow. This property is for the socially connected, free-spirited, and design-conscious person who thrives in an urban environment, and it’s ideal for those who want to stay with a smaller footprint. With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location.

The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.
Also, a short distance to Columbus Commons which is a six-acre park set within the scenic Downtown skyline. It is a gathering space for Central Ohio, a backyard for Downtown residents, and an attraction for people of all ages. Events for all ages are happening here throughout the year such as concerts, food truck festivals and more.
Children’s Hospital - 1.4 miles
Columbus State Community College - 1.2 miles
host_about:
Hello everyone! I am very excited to be apart of this wonderful community and make all my guests feel right at home. 

You can expect very fast communication and a response to any and all questions or concerns within minutes! 

Born and raised in Columbus, Oh. 

I LOVE to travel with my Wife and explore other great Airbnbs. Whether that's on the beach, lake or in the city! 

I look forward to connecting with people from all over the world as a host and traveler!

name: ★ Under the Sea ★ Private Home with Game Room ★
description:
Enjoy your stay in this newly renovated 3-bedroom house in Southern Orchards, a developing urban neighborhood near Nationwide Children’s Hospital. 15% off stays of seven nights or more.

Inside, you’ll find a game room complete with arcade machines, shuffleboard, and skeeball. Each bedroom has an adjustable bed and 55-inch smart TV. Fenced backyard comes with a grill, patio seating, and a small bocce ball court.

15 min to airport, 10 min to OSU, and 5 min to Nationwide Children’s Hospital.

The space
• Three bedrooms, one bathroom.
• Smart TVs in the living room and each bedroom, with access to any of your streaming subscriptions and complementary Hulu TV service.
• Fully equipped kitchen with new stainless steel appliances.
• Game room includes arcade cabinets, skeeball, and shuffleboard.
• Fenced in back yard, great for pets.
• Off street parking for two cars in the garage. Plenty of on street parking if you need m
neighborhood_overview: Southern Orchards is a developing urban neighborhood near Nationwide Children’s hospital undergoing rapid redevelopment. It's a diverse area, and its central location makes it easy to get anywhere around Columbus.
host_about:
I’m a moderately geeky real estate investor who prefers to be outdoors and is an avid hiker, fisher, runner and explorer. 

I live in one of my favorite places, Columbus, Ohio.  I provide fun, affordable, high end, safe and memorable vacation homes and event venues in and around the city.  I take pride in my properties and always respond to guests' needs.

I love great food and cocktails and am full of suggestions for fulfilling local experiences.  

I love to travel.  A few of my favorite destinations include Barcelona, Jaipur, Paris, Santorini, Athens, London, and Manhattan Montana.

I love animals.  I own cats and grew up with dogs.   I design my homes to be pet friendly.  I would love to meet your pets.

name: Charming Cottage close to downtown Columbus
description:
Charming urban cottage in Merion Village near downtown Columbus. Walk to German Village and Merion Village restaurants & Schiller Park.

The space
Built in 1920, our cottage features modern conveniences while preserving much of the original charm. We chose comfy and neutral furnishings and highlighted them with art from local artists (we LOVE supporting local businesses!). We have new mattresses, couch, linens, etc. relax in the vintage claw foot tub! Stream your favorite shows on the 55' smart tv or spend an evening playing board games that are provided. Cook a meal in the fully stocked kitchen. Swing on the porch swing overlooking the perennials in the fenced in backyard. Walk to many nearby restaurants, coffee shops, etc.

Guest access
Check yourself in with keyless entry!

Other things to note
This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process.

License number
2020-1971

Awesome airport location with beautiful outdoor grass area

Guest access
There is parking onsite

name: The Playful London Flat—DOWNTOWN/ARENA/CONV CENTER
description:
Warm, modern, quiet flat w/private balcony in heart of Downtown Columbus steps from pubs, cafes, Capitol Square, Arena District & riverfront. Wood floors throughout, granite kitchen, tasteful decor. In-unit laundry, cable, high-speed Wi-Fi & home office. Secure elevator building has dramatic Sky Lounge & roof patio, too! Great discounts for longer stays... Try your dates to see!

STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING, NO PARTIES/EVENTS & NO PETS. See RESIDENTIAL RENTAL AGREEMENT under House Rules.

The space
The property is approx. 700sf setup as a true 1br/1ba with private bedroom. Bathroom has large walk-in shower. There is a private balcony with an nice view over Gay Street and of Downtown Columbus skyline. Bedroom has window for natural light and spacious walk-in closet with upgraded shelving system.

License number
2019-1911
neighborhood_overview: This property is along the Gay Street Corridor at the corner of N 3rd St and E Gay St, which is one block from the State Capitol building, 2 blocks from the riverfront & Columbus Commons park, 3-4 blocks from Arena District, and 5 blocks (10 mins walk) to Convention Center.
host_about: Realtor based in Columbus, OH specializing in urban condominium sales and rentals with a focus on urban properties in and near Downtown Columbus.

description:
Our studio retreat has the amenities you'll need to relax & enjoy your stay. Off-street parking. Only a 5-10 min walk to campus buildings! Comfy queen bed, large desk space, 40" Roku TV, 200Mbps WIFI, and a well-stocked kitchen if you prefer to cook your meals. Lots of natural light! Steps from High St's bars & restaurants! Whether you're working, resting, or exploring the city, our relaxing studio is perfect for you.

Wexner/Med Campus - 🚗 4min
Short North/DWTN - 🚗 6min
CMH Airport - 🚗 10min

The space
Our studio is in the heart of OSU student living so you'll likely get some noise from nearby events especially on nights and weekends. The space is comfortable, convenient, and functional - everything you need to feel at home for a night, or for a month. The kitchen is stocked with cooking essentials to prepare your own meals and coffee & tea for your morning routine. Pots, pans, spatulas, knives, glasses, electric stove, microwave, toaster, and
neighborhood_overview: We are located right in the heart of The Ohio State University campus which makes for a great central location throughout Columbus. This neighborhood is thriving with students and young adults - working from their porch, walking to and from High St, lounging on the grass of their front yards, and enjoying all sorts of outdoor activities. A 4 min walk to Newport Music Hall, 5 min walk to South campus of Ohio State, and a 5 min Uber to Short North/Downtown (Convention Center, Nationwide Arena, Mapfre, Hilton Downtown, etc.). Only a 4 min walk to High St, there are numerous restaurants, bars, breweries, event centers, and places for fun within a short distance of your stay. Please message me for any suggestions!
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!

name: Chic Loft of Short North✨ Walk High St, Full KTCHN
description:
Our charming & spacious loft is located in the heart of Columbus between Downtown and Ohio State Campus - only 500ft from High St & Summit Ave! Drop your bags, and walk 5-min to the best Art's District bars, restaurants, and shops! Our 1-bed loft has beautiful hardwood floors, laundry in-unit, 55" Smart TV, two futons for groups, and a large fully-stocked kitchen. Overnight street parking available. Please note that the proximity to High street and downtown can be noisy for a light sleeper!

The space
Our home features a spacious living room with futons, open kitchen concept with all of your meal prep essentials, beautiful hardwood floors, a 55" Roku Smart TV, and an in-unit washer & dryer (dryer sheets, detergent provided). Whatever the activity may be, the living room will invite it! The kitchen is fully stocked with dining needs for four, cooking essentials (pots, pans, spatulas, knives, etc), electric stove, microwave, and dishwasher! Enjoy a fresh pot of cof
neighborhood_overview: Located within a 10 min walk to 3 of the top 10 breweries in Columbus via Untappd (Hoof Hearted, Seventh Son, Zaftig)! This charming flat is situated two streets east of High St on E 5th Ave and is located in the heart of Columbus between the Short North and Ohio State Campus. We are less than a 5 min walk to some of the best restaurants, breweries, and bars in the city, not to mention the grocery market Kroger, and outdoor Weinland Park. Less than a mile away from the Columbus Convention Center, Nationwide Arena, Mapfre Stadium, and Downtown. Located right near the major roads and highways to make any drive easy. Use our Airbnb as your home base so you can explore the city and enjoy Columbus!

name: Renovated CentralB❤GermanVillage/ChildrensHospital
description:
Enjoy a stay at a 2story 2BD/1 Bath with beautiful design & details. One FREE parking spot at private parking lot! Located @The Schumacher Place of historic German Village, walking distance to Children’s Hospital, many trendy restaurants, café, shops, park & book loft of GV. Private entrance to outside with keyless self-check in. 1.2mi to Brewery District; 1.9mi to Downtown; 2.4mi to Convention Center; 2.5mi to Arena District. Easy access to Hwy. A great spot to enjoy what Columbus has to offer!

The space
NOTE: Local guests need to show ID before check in. The 3rd twin bed is a Folding Guest bed.
PLEASE READ THE HOUSE RULES BEFORE YOU BOOK! Outdoor security cameras are installed on the exterior of the building for the security of the premises.

-- Two story unit with private entrance to outside
-- 2 bedrooms, one bedroom has a queen size bed, one bedroom has two twin-bed.
-- Plus one twin-size portable folding guest beds with memory foa
neighborhood_overview:
The unit is locate at “The Schumacher Place” of The German Village:

* 10 minutes’ walk to the central German Village, a famous historic neighborhood (lots of restaurants, galleries & stores there, including “The Sycamore”, “Schmidts’s Sausage”, “Thurman Café” featured on TV)
* 15 minutes’ walk to Nationwide Childern’s Hoipital
* 0.5 mi to grocery store “Giant Eagle”
* 0.6 mi to “The Book Loft of German Village” (the famous bookstore with 32 rooms)
* 1.2mi to Brewery District
* 1.2 mi to Schiller Park (Village Center for festivals and neighborhood activities)
* 1.9 mi to downtown Columbus
* 2.4 mi to Convention Center
* 2.5 mi to Arena District
* 2.6 mi to Lou Berliner Sports park
* Walking distance to Chase bank, CVS, Yoga studio “The Space” etc.
* Other Restaurants and café shops within Walking Distance: Starbucks, Plank’s Café & Pizzeria, Chapman’s Eat Market (great take-out food; Owner & chef ran two Michelin-starred
host_about: I am a Columbus resident who enjoys life in Columbus and adores this city! Look forward to hosting you, and helping you have a great experience here!

name: Brand new Premier Downtown Condo - 412
description:
Welcome to our newest Columbus urban environment apartment community.
With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location. Perfect for a weekend away or business travel, this property will not disappoint. Here at Harlow your location is your biggest amenity!
We made a list of the urban hotspots that are steps from your front door!
The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.
Also, a short distance to Columbus Commons which is a six-acre park set within the scenic Downtown skyline. It is a gathering space for Central Ohio, a backyard for Downtown residents, and an attraction for people of all ages. Events for all ages are happening here throughout the year such as concerts, food truck festivals and more.
Children’s Hospital - 1.4 miles
Columbus State Community College - 1.2 miles


Ameniti

With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location.

Hello everyone! I am very excited to be apart of this wonderful community and make all my guests feel right at home. 

You can expect very fast communication and a response to any and all questions or concerns within minutes! 

Born and raised in Columbus, Oh.

name: Pet friendly 1 bedroom Northview D Near Airport
description:
Large one bedroom apartment. Perfect for temporary corporate housing, long term stays, or just a few nights. Super clean & airy modern unit with a great kitchen. Centrally located in Franklin Park with great public transportation to all of the restaurants, shops and attractions Columbus has to offer! Contemporary decor, WiFi and TV. You’re going to love this place!

The space
Inside the apartment and outside

Guest access
There is parking onsite

Other things to note
Great location in Bexley... very cute downtown! Explore the movie theater & Johnson’s ice cream!

NO SMOKING in unit. If evidence of smoking is detected by our housekeeping staff when you leave, there is a $150 smoke fumigation charge.

Please note that there are a few steps to enter the building.

License number
2020-1277
neighborhood_overview: North Bexley! Excellent location just a 6 minutes form the airport. 12 min from Downtown Columbus Convention Center, great restaurants nearby in Bexely including The Top Steakhouse.

name: Large Victorian Village home in great location!
description:
Conveniently located within walking distance of the Arena District, Short North, and a short distance from Ohio State, this spacious condo provides plenty of room for family gatherings, football games, and nights out friends. Just a stones throw from Zeno's bar, Katalina's Cafe, and Harrison's on Third!

*House parties are strictly prohibited*

The space
This townhouse located in Harrison West/German Village provides 4 finished floors of living space. This includes a finished basement with a large bedroom and a living room, main level with a large family room, kitchen, and half bath, 3 bedrooms on the third floor, and a open concept with 2 bedrooms on the top floor. Private backyard with fire pit and grill, as well as a beautiful shared front porch. PRIVATE PARKING SPACE in the back for at least two cars as well!

Guest access
Guests can enter through the front or back, parking is located in the rear.

name: ★ Lion Safari ★ Private Home with Game Room ★
description:
Located in a developing urban neighborhood near Nationwide Children’s Hospital, this Lion King themed 4-bedroom house is the perfect family getaway. 15% off stays of seven nights or more.

Inside, you’ll find each bedroom has a fully adjustable bed and 55-inch smart TV. Our basement has a game room with arcade cabinets, foosball, and shuffleboard. Outside, our fenced backyard comes with a grill and patio seating.

15 min to the airport, 10 to OSU, and 5 to Nationwide Children’s Hospital.

The space
• Four bedrooms, one and a half bathrooms.
• Smart TVs in the living room, game room, and each bedroom, with access to any of your streaming subscriptions and complementary Hulu TV service.
• Fully equipped kitchen with new stainless steel appliances.
• Office space with computer.
• Gameroom includes arcade cabinets, foosball, and shuffleboard.
• Fenced yard, great for pets.
• Off street parking for one car in the gara
neighborhood_overview: Southern Orchards is a developing urban neighborhood near Nationwide Children’s hospital undergoing rapid redevelopment. It's a diverse area, and its central location makes it easy to get anywhere around Columbus.
host_about:
I’m a moderately geeky real estate investor who prefers to be outdoors and is an avid hiker, fisher, runner and explorer. 

I live in one of my favorite places, Columbus, Ohio.  I provide fun, affordable, high end, safe and memorable vacation homes and event venues in and around the city.  I take pride in my properties and always respond to guests' needs.

I love great food and cocktails and am full of suggestions for fulfilling local experiences.  

I love to travel.  A few of my favorite destinations include Barcelona, Jaipur, Paris, Santorini, Athens, London, and Manhattan Montana.

I love animals.  I own cats and grew up with dogs.   I design my homes to be pet friendly.  I would love to meet your pets.

name: Brand New Downtown Condo/Near Nationwide Children's- 312
description:
Welcome to our newest Columbus urban environment apartment community.
With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location. Perfect for a weekend away or business travel, this property will not disappoint. Here at Harlow your location is your biggest amenity!
We made a list of the urban hotspots that are steps from your front door!
The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.
Also, a short distance to Columbus Commons which is a six-acre park set within the scenic Downtown skyline. It is a gathering space for Central Ohio, a backyard for Downtown residents, and an attraction for people of all ages. Events for all ages are happening here throughout the year such as concerts, food truck festivals and more.
Children’s Hospital - 1.4 miles
Columbus State Community College - 1.2 miles

name: Luxury Room Olde Towne East near Downtown
description:
Newly renovated duplex unit in Olde Town East next to Nationwide Children's Hospital. Memory foam mattress & pillows, double pane windows, central A/C, ceiling fans for ultimate comfort. Granite kitchen countertop & premium built in stainless steel appliances, bathroom tile flooring/walls & modern vanities, front load washer/dryer for style. Furniture made with solid wood & leather. Conveniently located near Downtown & German Village. Close to freeways & short distance from markets/restaurants.

The space
This listing is for the north bedroom of the house comes euro styled Queen bedroom furnishing with new ceiling fan and Nectar memory foam mattress and pillows.

There are total of 2 bedrooms available in this duplex unit. You can book one bedroom or the entire house in a separate listing by copy the link as shown below:

This is a completely renovated like new unit with modern style. Living room has genuine Italy leather sofa, glass coffee/end
neighborhood_overview: Close to Downtown Columbus, and not far from Ohio State University.  Within walking distance to Nationwide Children’s Hospital. Our neighborhood is going through a major revitalization and is quickly becoming the cool place to be. Infrastructure improvements such as water/gas lines, new block pave streets and home renovations are a common sight in our neighborhood.
host_about: We live in Silicon Valley in California.  This house is our home away from home in Columbus and it has been newly furnished with tender and care in every details just like we would want to live ourselves.  We welcome you to enjoy it whether it is for business trip or for leisure family vacation.  We hope it will bring you much comfort and satisfaction and return as often as you wish.

description:
Our Pet Friendly | 1 BR Downtown Condo is a perfect stay for your getaway. 

LOCATION. LOCATION. LOCATION.

Our location is in the heart of the city with plenty of our favorite bars, restaurants and parks nearby. We welcome all, including your furry friend but our micro unit is best for single, couples and business travelers!

We made a list of the urban hotspots that are steps from your front door!
Restaurants/Bars: The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.

Amenities within our property:
Secure building access, bike storage, community-wide Wi-Fi, and a coffee bar are just a few of the additional amenities Harlow offers. 

 
We offer covered off-street parking with elevator access, 24-hour fitness center and a dog park for your furry friend.

name: The Goodale Park Overlook (Suite)
description:
The Goodale Park Overlook is a second floor suite in a fantastic vintage building. Enjoy a panoramic view of Goodale Park and the historic “Circus House” from the front balcony! This suite includes two bedrooms, one bathroom, and one living room. Please note that this is a "guest suite" apartment and does not have access to a full kitchen (kitchenette only, as pictured). Parking is available for an additional $3/night.

The space
You will enter through the front door and walk up one flight of stairs. The suite includes:
-One bedroom with a queen bed, a desk, and office chair
-One bedroom with two twin beds
-One full bathroom
-The balcony, with two chairs and a porch swing for two
-A living room with Roku TV, kitchenette area, and couch seating for 4. You will need to use your own streaming accounts for the TV; no cable or local channels are available for free. The kitchenette includes a small refrigerator with a (very small) freezer comp
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: Downtown / Franklinton Condo 247
description:
Newly re-modeled 2 -story 1 bedroom Condo with open upstairs concept. Secure private entry with large deck and fenced yard. All new Electric , HVAC , Plumbing , Walls , fixtures, etc.
Located about 1 mile from city center with easy access to bars, restaurants, theaters , arenas, bike and walking paths.

name: Private room+2 sweet cats close to OSU/Short North
description:
***PHOTOS HAVE NOT BEEN UPDATED--ROOM IS FULLY FURNISHED***
Private 2nd floor ROOM 'C' in eclectic house only 3 blocks from THE Ohio State University & High Street! If you're looking for an affordable room, in a centralized location, close to all the action, then THIS is your spot! Walking distance or short ride/scooter to tons of bars, restaurants, & nightlife. Room is furnished with twin mattress, computer desk/chair, TV, shelves, lamp. Extra air mattresses available upon request!

The space
House is unique, eclectic and spacious in the lively South Campus neighborhood located between OSU and Short North. This 2nd floor room has a FULL SIZED bed along with a workspace with desk & chair. On the 2nd floor you have the option of 2 full sized bathrooms as well as laundry.

We do have 2 adorable friendly brother cats Frank & Fred who will likely greet you as soon as you walk through the door.

Guest access
Feel free to hang out in
neighborhood_overview: The South Campus neighborhood is one of the most centralized areas in all of Columbus. Within walking distance to THE Ohio State University campus, Short North, Victorian Village, Italian Village, and Arena District. Short Uber/Lyft to Downtown, Clintonville, Grandview, Franklinton, and Olde Towne East. Surrounded by bars, restaurants, nightlife and everything Columbus has to offer. There is both a Kroger and CVS within walking distance 0.4 miles away.

name: Charming 3 Bedroom Mid Century Clintonville Home.
description:
Completely updated home in the Columbus neighborhood of Clintonville. Steps away from great restaurants, coffee and ice cream shops! Located just north of The OSU campus, 15 min from downtown, 5 min to the state fair grounds, 20 min from airport. Easy access to local hospitals and just one mile from the Park of Roses. Less than a block from the bus-line. This charming home offers plenty of space with three bedrooms, living room, dining and a full basement for your entrainment.

The space
Three bed rooms, full kitchen, dinning, living room, and full basement with a bar, and large backyard with fire pit!

Guest access
Keyless entry located on the back door. Pass code will be given morning of check in.

Other things to note
NO Smoking or vaping

Please remove shoes in the home

Quite hours are 10pm -8am

Please be respectful of neighbors

Welcome to LuxBox Lofts! We’re consistently voted best airbnb in Columbus, and guests love us so much they usually book with us again. Newly renovated beautiful home, with property manager on-site to take care of all guests needs immediately. Arrive whenever you like, park for free on the street, and simply tap your code at the door. It's our goal to be your second home in the city.

The space
LuxBox is a modern smart loft. You get a private bedroom with keypad door lock. This room has 1 full size bed. Shared spaces include kitchen, living room, and 2 full bathrooms. Second bathroom has walk-in shower.

Clean and modern bedroom includes premium memory foam mattress and pillows, bedside lamp with USB charging ports, AC/heat, hanging clothing storage, extra towels and blankets.

Each room has a smart TV with a $100 entertainment package, including an assortment of Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Video, Disney+, HBO, Starz, CBS All Access, ESPN+, Dekkoo, Ni
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is near Southern Orchards, undergoing renovations thanks to the expansion of Nationwide Children's Hospital. name: OSU Retreat 💎 Wifi Workspace, Kitchen, Free PRKG
description:
Our studio retreat has everything you need to relax & enjoy your stay. Off-street parking. 10 min walk to campus buildings! Queen bed, large desk space, 200Mbps WIFI, 32" TV w/Roku, and a well-stocked kitchen to cook your meals. Steps from High St bars, restaurants, and OSU action! Expect noise in the neighborhood. Whether working, resting, or exploring the city, our cozy studio is perfect for you.

Target - 🚶‍♂️7min
Ohio Union - 🚶‍♂️5min
Med Campus - 🚗 4min
ShortNorth/DWTN - 🚗 6min
Airport - 🚗 10min

The space
Our studio is in the heart of OSU student living so you will get some noise from nearby events, especially on weekends. The space is comfortable, convenient, and functional - everything you need to feel at home for a night, or for a month. The kitchen is stocked with essentials for cooking like pots, pans, spatulas, knives, electric stove, microwave, toaster, etc. 32" TV w/Roku (No cable).
Keep your morning routine going
neighborhood_overview: We are located right in the heart of The Ohio State University campus which makes for a great central location throughout Columbus. This neighborhood is thriving with students and young adults - working from their porch, walking to and from High St, lounging on the grass of their front yards, and enjoying all sorts of outdoor activities. A 4 min walk to Newport Music Hall, 5 min walk to South Campus of Ohio State, and a 5 min Uber to Short North/Downtown (Convention Center, Nationwide Arena, Mapfre, Hilton Downtown, etc.). Only a 4 min walk to High St, there are numerous restaurants, bars, breweries, event centers, and places for fun within a short distance of your stay. Please message me for any suggestions!
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!

The Grandview Guesthouse is a newly renovated 3 BR/1 Bath home in Grandview Heights. You can't beat this location--steps away from all that Columbus has to offer, but so comfortable you won't want to leave!

Free wi-fi and off-street parking

2 miles from downtown, 2 miles from Ohio Stadium. Walking distance to some of the best restaurants in town, and about 15 minutes from the airport.

NO SMOKING ANYWHERE INSIDE OR ON THE PROPERTY.

**NO PETS AND NO PARTIES**

name: Quiet Hotel Stay I in the Indie Art Capital 157
description:
King Bed, Non-Smoking, Free Breakfast, WiFi, OTA TV, 24 Hour Reception. Daily Housekeeping. Your room charge will be paid prior to your arrival. The remaining balance of taxes (10% City Tax, 7.5% County Tax) will be charged upon arrival. This is a hotel located at I-71 and SR-161 junction with easy access to Polaris Fashion Centre (5 mi), Down Town (10 mi), OSU airport (4 mi). Columbus Zoo is just 20 min drive. Zaftig Brewing and Anheuser-Busch are in biking distance.

The space
Due to Covid-19, breakfast is grab and go. We provide individually wrapped pastries and you also have the option to make various varieties of coffee. Plenty of parking space available for large pickup or van with trailers.

name: Complete Home-Privacy/Security and Great Location
description:
A newly renovated charming 4-square home located near Weinland Park and Italian Village District just 2 blocks away from Kroger and a 15 minute walk to the Short North restaurants. This 4 bedroom home is 10 mins from the airport, 2 miles or 5 minutes from downtown, and 15 mins walk to OSU. This home is perfectly located in the "middle" of everything. Home is fully secured with a fence, ring security and a private 1 car garage.

The space
Enjoy the fenced in yard with coffee in the morning on the deck. Make use of the fully stocked kitchen preparing meals for a nice quiet meal or take it easy and have doordash deliver to the front door with our on street parking.

Guest access
You can use all spaces except the garage and basement

name: Privacy near Grandview, OSU, and the Short North
description:
Stay in a private house that is clean and sanitary in a neighborhood that is safe and convenient.

A newly listed, Superhost property, this charming house offers all of the amenities of home in a centrally located part of Columbus. We call our house the Black Forest Cottage and you will notice subtle touches throughout that hint to both Black Forest Germany and Scandinavian design.

The yard features a massive outdoor living room, spa hot tub, and grill under a gazebo with privacy curtains.

The space
Make our home you next home away from home. It is perfect for traveling professionals who need a quiet and relaxing place with all of the amenities of home. We have a fast WiFi mesh network to provide strong signal throughout the house and backyard. Enjoy our full size washer and deluxe dryer which has a separate upper drying cabinet for hanging shirts or pants to provide a wrinkle free finish. Otherwise, use the provided Iron and Ironing
neighborhood_overview: Located in the City of Columbus/Grandview area, this house is situated in a friendly, family oriented, and quiet location, while still being very accessible (walkable) to restaurants, retail, and parks.  The Ohio State University, Wexner Medical Center, and historic neighborhood are very close by (less than a mile away).
host_about: I'm an outgoing type who values the experience of travel.  Airbnb helps me to afford to travel more.  I love meeting new people.  I actually grew up in a Bed & Breakfast so hosting seems to come very naturally to me.

name: Designer Downtown 2BR w/Garage Parking + Gym + WiFi
description:
Stay in our furnished designer apartment just 9 minutes from OSU! ✔ High Floor Apt In Secure Luxury Building
✔ 2 Bedrooms & 2 Full Bathrooms + Sleeper Sofa (Sleeps 6!)
✔ Free Garage Parking
✔ Washer & Dryer In Unit
✔ Walkable to Restaurants, Coffee Shops, Breweries
✔ Impressive Fitness Center (and pool in the summer!)
✔ Blazing fast WiFi
We know you'll love everything this luxury apartment has to offer. Book today while your dates are still available!

The space
Step out from our peaceful, secure apartment building and you'll be a short walk from all the attractions of downtown Columbus!
What our guests love about our listing:
- Spotlessly Clean (we are OCD and you can tell)
- No steps! Elevator access (2 elevators)
- Walkable to award-winning restaurants, breweries, coffee shops, parks, etc.
- Bright and modern (professionally decorated)
- Easy self-checkin via secure door keypad
neighborhood_overview:
Our building is in a hot new neighborhood in downtown Columbus called the River South District. It's artsy, funky, and modern.

Our place is nestled along the river, practically next door to COSI and a stone's throw from Bicentennial Park. You'll love all the art and hand-painted murals.

New breweries, coffee shops, and restaurants are opening up constantly (there are several opening on the first floor of our building right now!).

It's super easy to get anywhere downtown from our place...by car, bicycle, scooter, Uber/Lyft, walking, etc.

When we give people tours of our place, many of them end up saying they'd love to live here. :)
host_about: Hi there! My wife and I are the founders of Epicurean Properties; a small business based in Columbus, OH. I’m passionate about travel and hospitality, and she’s a talented interior designer. This business allows us to blend all of our favorite things together. We enjoy staying at top hotels and rentals around the world and learning from them in order to create awesome experiences for our own guests. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions!

name: Housepitality - The Old North Guest House - OSU
description:
The Old North Guest House is a great choice for your visit to Columbus. Enjoy the charm and character in a historic Columbus neighborhood! This half of a double house has 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and sleeps up to 6. Enjoy the charm of the hardwood floors, french doors, and a classic lemonade front porch. The best part is the location! Just 5 minutes from OSU, and 10 minutes to downtown Columbus. Our location is a short walk to lots of great restaurants, and bars in Clintonville and OSU !

The space
Our historic home was built in the 1900s! Feel like a part of the history, when you stay in our Old North Guest house. With beautiful restored hardwood floors, and a charming craftsman feel, you can experience a classic Columbus house.

Our first floor has a living room, dinning room, and kitchen. The 2nd floor has 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms! The third floor is not set up, and is off limits.

60Mpbs Hi-speed internet installed.
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

Welcome business traveler, gamer, and guest to your 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom abode. This modern apartment sleeps 4 guests, has a full kitchen, and 2 full bathrooms with 1 tub/shower combo. Enjoy keyless entry for easy check-ins/check outs. Located in a safe family neighborhood surrounded by restaurants, shopping, bowling, Topgolf, and a movie theater. Quick access to I-270 and I-71, minutes from Polaris Fashion Center, CMH airport, downtown Columbus, and OSU.

The space
***10% off weekly bookings***
***15% off 28 day bookings***
***20% off 8 week bookings***
Bedroom(s): Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom. Enclosed shower, new memory foam king size mattress/bed, and 32” smart TV. Guest bedroom with new memory foam queen size mattress/bed, 32” smart TV, and access to full bath.

neighborhood_overview:
You are very close to Polaris Mall which is one of the best malls in the city. There's a great deal of wonderful restaurants in this area such as Cheesecake factory, Mitchell's Steakhouse, and BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse to name a few . A movie theater, Top Golf, Dave and Busters, Magic Mountain, upscale bars, You will not want to leave this area. However there is Easton Town Center and Downtown Columbus so you will have a hard time running out of places to visit. Close to businesses like JP Morgan Chase, Molina, etc.
Local Attractions:
Magic Mountain Fun Center
Good Vibes Winery
Top Golf

host_about: I use to own a collection agency and got burned out I have since joined 3 others to start a corporate housing business for professional travelers and tourists alike. name: Home Away From Home While You Wait!
description:
Welcome to your Home Away From Home.

Spacious home meant for laughter and relaxation while you and your family await your next permanent home! Whether buying or building, this home is for you. 3 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, large eat-in kitchen, loft, first floor laundry, rear deck and fenced yard.

Located in a quiet neighborhood, 15 minutes to downtown Columbus , 7 minutes to Children's Hospital. Tons of natural light, and space for the perfect family getaway.

The space
This home is offered specifically for those individuals or families that are in transition short term from one home to the next. Guests will need to bring their own linens, dishware, flatware, toiletries, etc. All rooms are furnished, and a television with Roku is provided in the loft. Relax and be comfortable as you wait for to close on your new home. Whether you are building or buying - this is the place for you!

name: Private Backyard/Patio Home, Heart of Victorian Village #317
description:
A spacious, modern home with 2 full bedrooms, 1.5 full bathroom, This spacious, modern condo-home is located in the heart of the Victorian Village. Victorian Village is one of central Ohio's cores of fine residential architecture. The area is known for its Victorian houses and central location. Just a block away from North Market and the Columbus Convention Center and its northern boundary, West Fifth Avenue, is half a mile away from The Ohio State University.

Our customer service hours are from 8am to 10pm. Please reach out to us if you're checkin in late before 10pm that way we can assure a smooth check in.

Victorian Village is consistently ranked a top Columbus neighborhood. It is ranked the ninth most walkable neighborhood in Columbus with a walk score of eighty-three. Some homes have been split into rented apartments, but many are nationally registered historical landmarks
A number of bars and restaurants can be found along the eastern boundary
host_about:
Hello everyone! I am very excited to be apart of this wonderful community and make all my guests feel right at home. 

You can expect very fast communication and a response to any and all questions or concerns within minutes! 

Born and raised in Columbus, Oh. 

I LOVE to travel with my Wife and explore other great Airbnbs. Whether that's on the beach, lake or in the city! 

I look forward to connecting with people from all over the world as a host and traveler!

name: Rest assured 5
description:
Hi and thanks for checking out our space! Katie and I (William) have a beautiful home built in 1900 that is located directly across from the historic Ohio Dominican University. We have two Private bedrooms available for short term or long term visits. Conveniently located minutes from the airport and within very easy access to i670/i270. Also a short drive/ride to downtown Columbus and the Short North. We have a minimum stay of 30 days.

The space
By booking with us you will have a private room with a Full/Queen sized bed and access to our WiFi. You will share a common bath located on the same floor and will also have access to the full kitchen. You will also have access to the common dining room as well as to the laundry room.

Guest access
While staying with us you will have access to all common areas of the home and grounds.
host_about: I am a working professional currently at Abbott Nutrition. Columbus Ohio is home and I am a huge Ohio State fan! I love to travel and go on outdoor adventures around the world. As much as I enjoy to be active, being comfortable at home or while away is a top priority for me. I am also always excited to meet new friends!

name: The Silver Sunburst Flat—Downtown/Arena District
description:
Chic modern condo w/balcony in heart of Downtown Columbus steps from pubs, cafes, Capitol Square, Arena District & riverfront. Wood flooring (no carpet), granite kitchen. In-unit W/D, cable, great Wi-Fi & home office space. Secure elevator building. Plenty of parking options nearby (garages, lots, on-street). Great discounts for longer stays... Try your dates to see!

STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING, PETS, PARTIES OR EVENTS. See HOUSE RULES / RESIDENTIAL LEASE for important info.

The space
The property is approx. 700sf setup as a true 1br/1ba with private bedroom. Bathroom has tub/shower. There is a private balcony with a nice view of Downtown Columbus skyline. Large bedroom has a home office area with desk.

Guest access
This listing is for the entire 1br/1ba condo unit.

name: Bright + Modern 1BR in Downtown
description:
All Frontdesk stays are contactless self-check-in and include Scout, our exclusive digital companion to guide you through everything you'll need before and during your time with us. We're also available 24/7 via text or phone and have a local team should you need anything.
Guests are required to follow all regional and building-specific COVID-19 policies. We continue to employ a professional cleaning staff adhering to OSHA and CDC guidelines to make sure your stay is clean and comfortable.

The space
Our one-bedroom apartment is furnished with a queen bed, a couch, and a queen-sized air mattress. It has everything you & your guests need to enjoy your stay in Columbus! The kitchen is adorned with stainless steel appliances, a Keurig coffee maker, and basic cookware to cook simple meals for a cozy night in! A washer and dryer are also available inside the apartment for your convenience.

A parking garage is located off-site, however it is paid at your
neighborhood_overview: Our suite is nestled right in the heart of Downtown Columbus’ River South District. This recently-transformed neighborhood has quickly gone from a long-forgotten area to a vibrant urban destination with a burgeoning nightlife and arts scene. River South is home to some of the best bars, restaurants, and coffee shops that Columbus has to offer. Take in some fresh air in this river-side neighborhood and go for a walk along the Scioto Greenway and through Bicentennial Park.
host_about: Frontdesk offers trusted travelers exactly the stay they want - their kind of place, in their kind of neighborhood.

name: Urban 3BD Apt. Near Children's, Downtown, & OTE
description:
Enjoy your stay at a newly renovated urban, 3 BD/1 Bath apt with thoughtful details and a focus on comfort located in an up-and-coming, diverse neighborhood. Located just 3 blocks from Nationwide Children's Hospital, you'll be minutes from all that Downtown has to offer. Although you are within walking distance to new restaurants, breweries, and coffee shops; this neighborhood is going through a revitalization period and is considered transitional. Absolutely no smoking allowed on the property

The space
Don't be intimidated by the lack-luster appearance of the outside (we're scheduled for new siding in the spring...) Self-check in using the keypad on the front door and find a cozy living space, table seating for 4, and an updated kitchen stocked with the essentials (including water and coffee!). Sign-in to your streaming services on the provided amazon firestick to watch your favorite shows or utilize our small selection of board games to keep yourself enterta
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Southern Orchards; a small, transitional neighborhood located next to German Village and Olde Town East.  Nationwide Children's Hospital (3 blocks away) has played an integral part in the revitalization of the neighborhood.  Although a lot of work has been done to update the neighborhood, there are a few owners that have chosen to wait for higher sales prices before selling, and have boarded their investment until they decide to sell.  You will see kids riding their bikes and young families walking their dogs. You may also see a driver speeding down the street or playing their music too loudly.
host_about: Hello, my name is Annie! My husband and I are the owners of Columbus Accent Homes! We live in Columbus with our two dogs. We love hosting in Columbus, but we also love to travel and always try to stay in Airbnbs so we get a better feel for the local scene. Interested in hosting your space in Columbus on Airbnb?  Send me a message; I'd love to help!

name: German Village Home 2
description:
Huge historical home that can comfortably accommodate a large group or family. Home has 4 queen sized beds, sofa couch. First floor bedroom and bathroom. 10 foot ceilings with original stained woodwork. Perfect location located in German Village, a popular area of Columbus. Close to all popular locations and only a 10 minute drive to The Ohio State University! 5 minute drive to Nationwide Children's Hospital. Pets are welcome at all of our properties with a $20.00 fee per stay regardless of how many furbabies come.

License number
2019-1354
host_about:
We are childhood friends and business partners.
We are originally from Canton, Ohio and now reside in the Cleveland area. We both graduated from The Ohio State University and started hosting on Airbnb in 2013. We started Cleveland House Hotels, which is a short term vacation property company in 2015.  We have a full time cleaning staff and maintenance person on hand to take care of any issues.  We also have our reservations specialist, Deanna who will be the one responding to your requests.

Niko (Nick) has been in the hospitality business for many years, having worked in hotels and restaurants.  He owns a small diner in Old Brooklyn called Gus's Family Restaurant.  He is married and has two children.  In addition to cooking and owning a restaurant, Niko is the co-founder and COO of Cleveland House Hotels.  

Billy is a co-founder and CEO of Cleveland House Hotels.  Billy is a successful real estate investor and has been in the sales business for over 15 years.  He loves traveling and spending time with his son, William.

name: The Goodale Park Overlook
description:
The Goodale Park Overlook is a large 2-story apartment in a fantastic vintage brick duplex house. Large windows, hardwood floors, high ceilings, and custom touches will make this a unique and memorable stay! Enjoy a panoramic view of Goodale Park from the front balcony or walk 5 minutes to High Street shopping and dining. Plenty of room for larger groups with 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, and 3 separate living room areas.

Street parking is available for $3/night.

The space
The Airbnb spans the entire second and third floors of the building. You will enter through the front door and come straight up the stairs to the second floor. This leads to the front living room (with the balcony) and the first bedroom with a queen bed. Moving down the hallway, you will find the second bedroom with two twin beds, and a hallway bathroom. At the other end of the first floor, there is a second living room area, the "master" bedroom, and the kitchen. The master bed
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

host_about:
We are childhood friends and business partners.

We also have our reservations specialist, Deanna who will be the one responding to your requests.

He is married and has two children.  In addition to cooking and owning a restaurant, Niko is the co-founder and COO of Cleveland House Hotels.

name: Clintonville Charmer | Walk to Great Restaurants!
description:
Be our guest at this charming Clintonville home, located on a quiet street in a safe neighborhood - and just a 4-minute walk from the fabulous Northstar Cafe on High Street!

This comfortable single-family home has two first-floor bedrooms and a welcoming open kitchen/dining/living space for gathering. Walk to the Columbus Park of Roses or Whetstone High School in about 10 minutes. Drive to Riverside Hospital in 7 minutes, or make it downtown or to the airport in just 15 minutes!

The space
You'll park in the private driveway and enter through the back door of the home, into the living room area. This is a "great room" which features gleaming hardwood floors, open living space with a TV, a dining table for four, and an open kitchen with two stools at the counter.

The first floor has two bedrooms, each with a queen bed, and one hallway bathroom which features a wide doorway and an accessible roll-in shower. One bedroom is in the "front room"
neighborhood_overview:
Not kidding here: Clintonville was recently named the "Nicest Place in Ohio" by Reader's Digest. Here's a short excerpt from the article:

The Clintonville neighborhood in Columbus, Ohio is an older area of the city filled with a wealth of houses built in the early 1900’s, stately old trees, parks, shops, restaurants and possibly the highest density of Toyota Priuses per capita of anywhere you’ll find. The sense of community is really impressive here and our neighborhood recently gained national attention when two young aspiring musicians put on a porch recital for their 78 year old neighbor Helena Schlam while she was sheltering in place at home.
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: Bexley Mid-Mod Masterpiece near Downtown & Airport
description:
Mid-century modern masterpiece in Central Bexley steps to churches, synagogues & dining, and 5-10 mins drive to airport or Downtown Columbus! Perfect for families. 3BR/2BA all on 1 level, plus finished basement w/den & bonus bedroom. Beautifully furnished & decorated! New paint, flooring, carpet. Sunny open floor plan. Fully-equipped kitchen & spacious dining. Home office space. Lovely deck & landscaping. 1 covered + up to 3 more off-street parking spots. High-speed internet & DirecTV. W/D.

The space
This is a classic mid-century modern house (originally built 1956) with authentic architectural details including central decorative fireplace. Ranch floor plan with 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths all on main level. Lovely open staircase to finished basement with 2 more rooms (den and bonus guest bedroom). Rear deck with outdoor dining for 6 & gas grill! Great front porch, classic side-load carport out front, and generous driveway with parking for up to 4 vehicles total
neighborhood_overview: Bexley is an old-line suburb just 4-5 miles due east of Downtown Columbus. It has classic homes mostly built from the 1920s-1950s. There are churches, schools, and commercial retail nearby. This house is on S Gould Rd, on the City of Columbus side (east) of the street, so while it is, for all intents and purposes, in Central Bexley, it is in Columbus City Schools. This is disclosed for the purpose of any long term guest with school-age children needing to attend public schools.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer splitting my time between Columbus, Manhattan, and Barcelona. My wife and I travel all over the country and world, now with our two little boys. We're Superhosts ourselves, which make us very courteous guests and will always leave your place tidy upon our departure, just as we’d hope you’d treat our home.  

Check out our listings if you’re interested in staying at one of our properties in Columbus. From a stunning 3 bedroom Mid-century modern home in Bexley to turn of the century historic brick homes in the heart of German Village. You're covered on your next trip to Columbus whether looking for a weekend retreat, a relaxing place to call home during a business trip, attending a convention, a wedding, or in need of longer-term accommodations for your medical residency or stint as a professor at OSU!
We look forward to hosting you!

Come and experience this quaint, quietly nestled Cottage in the world famous German Village! Walk-able to dozens of restaurants, attractions, and parks. This bright and cozy cottage offers everything you might need during your time with us!

This home features clean and modern furniture and styling, blended perfectly with the home's classic architecture. Free dedicated parking!!
Whether you are a weary traveler, or just need a change of WFH scenery, German Village Cottage is the one for you!

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is safe and charming. I have owned the house for many years. There are many things to see (and eat) in the neighborhood!

If you are looking for food:

The world famous, Schmidt's Sausage Haus and Restaurant is a short 8min walk. Has all types of authentic German sausages, pretzels and pastries.

I also recommend Barcelona Restaurant & Bar, it has phenomenal ambiance and features traditionally Spanish cuisine.

The Brown Bag is located closeby on Whittier, awesome breakfast and lunch fare.

For spirited drinks and beers, here are my neighborhood favorites:

- Antiques on High - phenomenal atmosphere, sour beers and cocktails.

- Law Bird - great little wine and cocktail spot, also on High St.

name: The Jungle Book 🌿 - Short North / OSU / Downtown
description:
Welcome to The Jungle Book! Literally a 3 minute walk to the Columbus Convention Center, 5 minute walk to Nationwide Arena, blocks away from the historical Short North district & Downtown Columbus and minutes from Ohio State, this beautiful modern jungle home is in the middle of everything! From local favorite coffee, galleries, shops, restaurants & bars all within the surrounding area, this area offers you anything you would ever want!

The space
When modern meets the jungle!! Our jungle home is filled with gorgeous plants, upscale & vintage decor, original hardwood floors on all floors, the comfiest King & Queen size bed you will ever sleep on, quartz countertops with a fully equipped kitchen, high speed internet, Smart TVs in the living room with additional Smart TVs in all bedrooms, tower fans & white noise machines for light sleepers, hair dryer & handheld steamer, huge dining room table and much more!!

Perfect home for anyone going to an event
neighborhood_overview:
Location could honestly not be more perfect!! There are so many great restaurants and bars right on North High Street to check out with their own unique character & AMAZING food! Bakersfield is a personal favorite of ours for their delicious margaritas and the tacos are to die for.. and right down the block! Also must try Jeni's Ice Cream down the block as well, you will not be disappointed!

& the home’s front yard is the beautiful Goodale Park which is a guest favorite to walk around at!

name: Spacious 1bd Suite ♥🎶 Inspired by the BEATLES
description:
Come together in the vibrant and historic Arts District of Columbus! Our centrally-located 1 bed has everything you need to enjoy a short weekend trip or a monthly stay. Featuring a comfy queen bed, full kitchen, beautiful hardwoods, high-speed wifi, laundry in-unit, pull out couch, and 8 Beatles' records on vinyl souvenirs! Only 500ft from High St & tacos! Busy road can be loud at night. Street parking available, but can be tight after 6pm! Wherever you're headed, all you need is love :)

The space
Our home features a spacious living room with a pull out couch, open kitchen concept with all of your meal prep essentials, beautiful hardwood floors, a 50" Smart TV with Roku (no cable), and an in-unit washer & dryer (dryer sheets, detergent provided). Throw on one of the 8 Beatles records and spread the love! Whatever the activity may be, the living room will invite it! The kitchen is fully stocked with dining needs for four, cooking essentials (pots, pans, spatulas
neighborhood_overview: Located within a 10 min walk to 3 of the top 10 breweries in Columbus via Untappd (Hoof Hearted, Seventh Son, Zaftig)! This charming flat is situated two streets east of High St on E 5th Ave and is located in the heart of Columbus between the Short North and Ohio State Campus. We are less than a 5 min walk to some of the best restaurants, breweries, and bars in the city, not to mention the grocery market Kroger, and outdoor Weinland Park. Less than a mile away from the Columbus Convention Center, Nationwide Arena, Mapfre Stadium, and Downtown. Located right near the major roads and highways to make any drive easy. Use our Airbnb as your home base so you can explore the city and enjoy Columbus!
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!

name: Majestic Mohawk II • German Village •Schiller Park
description:
Located in the heart of historic German Village, this charming home has a beautiful outdoor patio and garden, eat-in kitchen, king bedroom, 2 living rooms w/pull out sofa beds, Smart TVs, W/D, and Wi-Fi. Just 2 blocks from beautiful Schiller Park & a stone's throw from German Village's incredible restaurants, bars, & coffee shops, you're 1/4 mile from downtown, 1 mile from Short North & near Arena, Convention Center & OSU Campus.

The space
2-story layout has twin living rooms and kitchen on main level with main bedroom upstairs, including a desk office space. Both living rooms have pull-out sofas. The screened-in private deck that is accessible from the back door and from a shared backyard garden.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire home, which is half of a double. A private screened-in porch, and a shared backyard patio.

Other things to note
See RESIDENTIAL RENTAL AGREEMENT in House Rules.

S
neighborhood_overview: German Village is memorable for a thousand reasons, all of which are intimately personal to the individuals fortunate to reside in or visit the neighborhood. The sense of community is palpable, the historic architecture is beautiful, and the history is visible. German Village is not easily forgotten. From walkability to a great sense of community, German Village is an incredible place to be. You feel it when you cross through the Third Street gateway or explore the parks. Millions of individual bricks were placed on top of one another to form this Village.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer splitting my time between Columbus, Manhattan, and Barcelona. My wife and I travel all over the country and world, now with our two little boys. We're Superhosts ourselves, which make us very courteous guests and will always leave your place tidy upon our departure, just as we’d hope you’d treat our home.  

Check out our listings if you’re interested in staying at one of our properties in Columbus. From a stunning 3 bedroom Mid-century modern home in Bexley to turn of the century historic brick homes in the heart of German Village. You're covered on your next trip to Columbus whether looking for a weekend retreat, a relaxing place to call home during a business trip, attending a convention, a wedding, or in need of longer-term accommodations for your medical residency or stint as a professor at OSU!
We look forward to hosting you!

description:
Whether you're on a business trip, are temporarily relocating, or just taking a long vacation, you've found your home away from home. Our large two bedroom, one bath duplex unit is located in a quaint Downtown Columbus neighborhood, Olde Towne East. Walking distance or a quick Uber ride to many restaurants, bars, shops, and entertainment, we are accessible to it all. Work from home or at one of our partner coworking spaces nearby. Need concierge services? Personal assistants are a call away.

The space
Our modern unit was designed with business travelers in mind. The oversized main bedroom includes a King bed, double-entry closet, and an open-floor-plan office. The second room can be transformed into a reading room, yoga/fitness studio, or a full-size bedroom if needed. Get some fresh air in the private backyard, perfect for alone time or entertaining. Street parking in the front is available. The unit is fully equipped with a washer/dryer, fridge, microwave, oven
neighborhood_overview: Olde Towne East is a neighborhood located in the historical Near East Side of Columbus, Ohio and is one of Columbus' oldest neighborhoods. One block away you will find a few local hang-outs and eateries to include Yellowbrick Pizza, Olde Towne Tavern, Lifestyle Cafe (Vegan), Camelot Cellars (Winery) and Our Bar & Lounge. A few blocks further you will find my daily coffee shop, Upper Cup Coffee; a breakfast favorite, Hangover Easy; brunch and cocktails at The Olde Oak and the perfect patio at Germut Biergarten. All in walking distance! There are also a handful of great shops, gardens and parks in the area.

name: Nice 3 bd 1 bth just minutes from OSU, CMH, DWNTWN
description:
Just 2 miles from OSU and Nationwide Children's Hospitals, Columbus nightlife, downtown bars, restaurants and shops. About 4 miles to the Short North Arts District and CMH airport. This home has been fully remodeled. With high ceilings, finished floors, and a fenced in backyard, there is plenty of room to breathe. Easily sleep 6-8 people. Each bedroom has a TV with easy access to your streaming subscriptions. Enjoy all that Columbus has to offer with this ideal location.

The space
The space is clean. Nice size rooms and bathroom. Laundry room on the first level for easy access. Plenty of appliances to cook or bake. Fully stocked coffee bar. Granite countertops. On-street parking.

Guest access
Free street parking - first come first serve.

License number
2021-2214
neighborhood_overview: This home is located in the Historic King Lincoln neighborhood with sidewalks throughout. A neighborhood park and basketball court is just steps away from the fenced in backyard. This neighborhood is less than a 5-minute drive or Uber to downtown/Columbus nightlife as well as the historic Short North Arts District, a hip, culture-rich area centered on N. High Street. It's also only 5 miles from The Ohio State University. Only 2 miles from OSU East Hospital and Nationwide Children's Hospital. This is an Urban environment in a transitioning family neighborhood. Please be sure to lock your cars/doors.
host_about: My name is Santoria! I am a graduate of The Ohio State University (Go Bucks). I'm also a working mama, author, speaker, investor, and business owner. name: Little Blue 1 Bed, 1 Bath Studio - RoweRentals
description:
‘Little Blue’ is a 1 bedroom, 1 bath studio located in the beautiful Italian Village, Short North, Columbus. This 2nd floor carriage house apartment is located in the rear of a custom home vacation rental that we endearingly call ‘Big Blue’. The 375 Sq Ft apartment, with a private entrance, is the perfect space for a quiet getaway. The studio consists of a living room area, dining/desk area, kitchen, and bathroom area. Experience this super cozy dwelling nestled in the prime Short North!

The space
The kitchen comes equipped with basic necessities to cook a decent meal (electric 2 top burner, microwave, air fryer, pots, pans, plates, glassware etc.) and has some basic cooking staples (olive oil, salt and pepper, sugar, coffee, tea, etc.). We provide a Mr. Coffee machine and Folders coffee too.

Open living space with living room, Kitchen and dining or desk area. The living room has comfortable seating and a smart TV (no cable service).

The b
neighborhood_overview:
The Short North Arts District is one of the Midwest’s best kept secrets. There is a huge variety of unique shops, bars and restaurants, and art galleries along High Street and a number of annual events that take place year-round. We have a thorough list of recommendations in the house to local bakeries, cafes, and restaurants.

The Short North is made up of several historic neighborhoods; this home is located in Weinland Park, a cool, urban area on the East side of High St above 5th Ave. Weinland Park still has its edgy, up-and-coming vibe- there is a lot of construction and development still underway, real estate is hot here despite its sometimes worn look. You will see a lot of renovated homes as well as ones not-yet-touched. This is not a cookie-cutter neighborhood; it's an historic, city neighborhood. The neighborhood is home to a mix of young professionals and families and close to an elementary school. This apartment is in walking distance to High Street and N. 4th St
host_about:
A few years after meeting in Japan, we moved to Columbus in 2OO9 and have been loving it ever since! We love traveling (25+ countries between us) and are passionate about renovating historic homes and building new homes. Please check out our IGs at @RoweRentals and @RoweHouseCbus to see our house journey.

We love being hosts- providing a comfortable home to travelers visiting our gem of a city- 'Cbus'! We know quite a lot about Short North entertainment & restaurants- there is so much to do here, feel free to ask!
- Ingrid, Mike, and Frances, Co-Host 

Our life motto- Live like someone left the gate open!

The space
Inspired by western ski towns and the beaches of California, the design of The River Birch is one of a kind.

The relaxing private front porch welcomes you to The River Birch unit. You enter the bright and newly renovated townhome and your eye is instantly drawn to the unique herringbone designed electric fireplace that holds a 50" Smart TV. There is a designated desk with plenty of outlets, and fast W
neighborhood_overview: This walkable, bikeable neighborhood, a short 1.5 miles from downtown Columbus and it’s major highways, is one of Columbus’ most coveted areas. A hybrid of urban flair and neighborhood warmth, Grandview’s vibes are at the same time laid-back and buzzing with energy. Stroll the wide, tree-lined sidewalks of Grandview Ave amid the hum of cafe-table chatter. Discover specialized independent shops, curated New-York style boutiques, a chocolatier’s gorgeous handmade truffles, independent breweries, top-rated coffee roasters, cutting-edge salons, and of course, world-class restaurants that use fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. The electric mix of restaurants here have consistently been recognized by critics and diners alike for their cuisine, ambience, and outstanding attention to detail. Grandview is also home to a collection of award-winning craft microbreweries and taprooms. A hub of creative culture and out-of-the-ordinary experiences, Grandview offers an array of guided food and drink
host_about: David and I love to travel be it near and far. We are constantly looking for the next adventure and when we do we always turn to Airbnb for our stays. Our favorite is exploring the great outdoors with furry mascot Cooper. We are self-employed real estate investors and designers in Columbus, Ohio. We work hard so that we can see all there is in this big wide world!

name: Quaint 1 Bedroom, Furnish Apt. Near OSU
description:
Your apt is in the upper level of my Victorian home. Fully furnished bedroom, full kitchen and bath. Wifi, central AC/heat & utilities included. Shares hall w/ house, but entirely private. 2 entrances: back entrance is private, front entrance, separate from my apt. downstairs.Off-street parking w/extra space, W/D available, .5 mi to OSU, Short North, Convention Center, Arena district;1 mi to downtown;2 mi to hospitals. 30 day min./perfect for traveling professional

The space
My home is on a quiet street in a lovely historic district (Victorian Village) close to everything. Your apartment is quaint, and though entirely private, shares a hall with two other bedrooms and a family room used by my children when they visit. You are welcome to share our common spaces as much as like, including the yard/garden. In the spring and summer, our backyard is beautiful with blooming magnolias, flowers, and vegetables (which we'll share too!). If you have guests visiting for
neighborhood_overview: Victorian Village is a beautiful, historic area of Columbus.  The houses were built around 1870-1890.  There are cafes, restaurants, shops, stores and Ohio State campus all nearby and within walking distance.  There are also gyms, salons, and Goodale park (a large, beautiful park with a pond, flowers and trees, tennis courts, playground, and lots of green space where people take their dogs to socialize and play).  If you enjoy hiking/nature, Columbus offers several Metroparks/nature reserves with hiking paths, picnic areas, nature hikes and related activities all within a 20 minute drive from my house. I'm a native of Columbus and have lived in this area since 2006 and really love it!
host_about: Hi! I'm Concetta! I love to travel, meet people and learn new languages!
