name: Majestic Mohawk III • German Village • Nationwide
description:
Located in the heart of historic German Village, this charming home has a beautiful outdoor patio and garden, eat-in kitchen, king bedroom, 2 living rooms w/pull out sofa beds, Smart TVs, W/D, and Wi-Fi. Just 2 blocks from beautiful Schiller Park & a stone's throw from German Village's incredible restaurants, bars, & coffee shops, you're 1/4 mile from downtown and Nationwide Children's Hospital, 1 mile from Short North & near Arena, Convention Center & OSU Campus.

The space
2-story layout has twin living rooms and kitchen on main level with main bedroom upstairs, including a desk office space. Both living rooms have pull-out sofas. The screened-in private deck that is accessible from the back door and from a shared backyard garden.

Other things to note
See RESIDENTIAL RENTAL AGREEMENT in House Rules.

STRICTLY ENFORCED: ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING, NO PARTIES / EVENTS. Pets are allowed for a $25/pet fee. Pets are never to be left unatte
neighborhood_overview: German Village is memorable for a thousand reasons, all of which are intimately personal to the individuals fortunate to reside in or visit the neighborhood. The sense of community is palpable, the historic architecture is beautiful, and the history is visible. German Village is not easily forgotten. From walkability to a great sense of community, German Village is an incredible place to be. You feel it when you cross through the Third Street gateway or explore the parks. Millions of individual bricks were placed on top of one another to form this Village.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer splitting my time between Columbus, Manhattan, and Barcelona. My wife and I travel all over the country and world, now with our two little boys. We're Superhosts ourselves, which make us very courteous guests and will always leave your place tidy upon our departure, just as we’d hope you’d treat our home.  

Check out our listings if you’re interested in staying at one of our properties in Columbus. From a stunning 3 bedroom Mid-century modern home in Bexley to turn of the century historic brick homes in the heart of German Village. You're covered on your next trip to Columbus whether looking for a weekend retreat, a relaxing place to call home during a business trip, attending a convention, a wedding, or in need of longer-term accommodations for your medical residency or stint as a professor at OSU!
We look forward to hosting you!

together or individually!

• COVID Certified Cleaners

ESPN+

• Fully stocked modern kitchen

• Washer & dryer w/detergent

The space
Inspired by mountain modern homes from our time out west, the design of The Blue Spruce is bold, sleek, and luxurious.

You enter the newly renovated townhome to warm natural light flooding in windows that flank a one-of-a-kind electric black fireplace feature that houses a 50" Smart TV.

There is a designated desk with plenty of outlets, and fast WiFi for you to work or play. The living space is bright and open to t
neighborhood_overview: This walkable, bike-able neighborhood, a short 1.5 miles from downtown Columbus and its major highways, is one of Columbus’ most coveted areas. A hybrid of urban flair and neighborhood warmth, Grandview’s vibes are at the same time laid-back and buzzing with energy. Stroll the wide, tree-lined sidewalks of Grandview Ave amid the hum of cafe-table chatter. Discover specialized independent shops, curated New-York style boutiques, a chocolatier’s gorgeous handmade truffles, independent breweries, top-rated coffee roasters, cutting-edge salons, and of course, world-class restaurants that use fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. The electric mix of restaurants here have consistently been recognized by critics and diners alike for their cuisine, ambience, and outstanding attention to detail. Grandview is also home to a collection of award-winning craft microbreweries and taprooms. A hub of creative culture and out-of-the-ordinary experiences, Grandview offers an array of guided food and drink
host_about: David and I love to travel be it near and far. We are constantly looking for the next adventure and when we do we always turn to Airbnb for our stays. Our favorite is exploring the great outdoors with furry mascot Cooper. We are self-employed real estate investors and designers in Columbus, Ohio. We work hard so that we can see all there is in this big wide world!

name: ★ Puppy Christmas  ★ Private Home Near OSU ★
description:
Celebrate Christmas year round in this pet friendly 3-bedroom house in the Old North near OSU. 15% off stays of seven nights or more.

Inside, you’ll find amenities like a fully equipped kitchen, laundry room, and TV and arcade cabinets in the living room. Each bedroom has a 55-inch smart TV and adjustable beds. The fenced in front and back yards boasts a grill and patio seating in the front yard and a doggy-obstacle course in the backyard.

5 minutes to OSU, 12 minutes to airport or downtown.

The space
• Three bedrooms, two fulls bathrooms.
• Smart TVs in the living room and each bedroom, with access to any of your streaming subscriptions and complementary Hulu TV service.
• Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
• Completely fenced in yard, great for pets.
• Gravel area for parking behind the house, can fit a large number of cars
• Clean towels and linens are provided.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: The Old North is the location for much of the off-campus housing for OSU. Most of the other properties in the area are student rentals. It’s safe and easily walkable and close to all the attractions Columbus has to offer.
host_about:
I’m a moderately geeky real estate investor who prefers to be outdoors and is an avid hiker, fisher, runner and explorer. 

I live in one of my favorite places, Columbus, Ohio.  I provide fun, affordable, high end, safe and memorable vacation homes and event venues in and around the city.  I take pride in my properties and always respond to guests' needs.

I love great food and cocktails and am full of suggestions for fulfilling local experiences.  

I love to travel.  A few of my favorite destinations include Barcelona, Jaipur, Paris, Santorini, Athens, London, and Manhattan Montana.

I love animals.  I own cats and grew up with dogs.   I design my homes to be pet friendly.  I would love to meet your pets.

name: *NEW* Industrial Historic Downtown Home
description:
NEW 2600 SF, 4BR / 3.5 Bath, Luxury Historic Home just 1 mile from downtown. Prime Location!

Top Finishes, Stainless Steel Appliances, Vaulted Ceilings, Spacious Open Layout, Modern Industrial feel while preserving the character of a 120+ y/o home. 10' ceilings and 3 finished floors.

Close to the best nightlife, bars, eateries, coffeeshops and shopping that Columbus has to offer. It’s a quick Uber drive to CMH airport. Easily sleeps 10-12. Enjoy all that Columbus has to offer. *NO PARTIES*

The space
We avoid hosting Columbus based/local guests. In rare occasions we will make exceptions - but rarely. Please inquire if you are a local with a non party inquiry.

Plenty of free street parking out front - self check-in with keypad

Home has high speed wifi, and smart TV’s in in every bedroom and living room.

Modern condo w/skyline views on trendy Gay Street Corridor location a short walk to Convention Center, Arena District, Riverfront, Capitol Sq. Dining, cafes, pubs. Wood floors (no carpet), granite & stainless steel, private bedroom w/walk-in closet, in-unit W/D. Secure elevator building. Great discounts for longer stays... Try your dates to see!

STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING, PETS, PARTIES OR EVENTS. See HOUSE RULES / RESIDENTIAL LEASE for important info.

The space
Approx 800sf of interior living space with a large bright great room with spaces for living, dining, home office and kitchen. Private bedroom off foyer has walk-in closet. Private bathroom has tub/shower and full size stacked laundry in-unit.

Guest access
This listing is for the entire property which is a 1RB/1BA condo unit.

Other things to note
This property is professionally managed by a licensed real estate agent.

host_about: Realtor based in Columbus, OH specializing in urban condominium sales and rentals with a focus on urban properties in and near Downtown Columbus.

name: Modern Farmhouse Townhome with Popcorn Machine!!
description:
Renovated historic brick townhouse located just outside of German Village. Walking distance to the Thurman Cafe, Plank's Cafe & Pizzeria, Parsons North brewing, among many more restaurants, bars, and cafes. Just recently remodeled, the home boasts many attractive features like stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, and a lovely relaxing bathroom with a vintage clawfoot tub! If you're in town for the night life, looking for some great food, or just a get away this is the perfect location.

The space
Film lovers will relish in our cinema themed living room, which even includes a complimentary popcorn machine. The spacious living area has a comfortable sleeper sectional that quickly and easily converts into a spacious bed when you remove the back cushions and pull out the underframe.

In the dining area you will also find the dining table which will comfortably seat six guests and a cool swing! The kitchen is completely equipped with top of the range

name: The Treetop Hideaway • Work & Relax in OSU Area
description:
Enjoy our bright and cozy 1 bed hideaway right by OSU, in the heart of the hip Old North! Take a short walk to High St for some of the best pizza & BBQ in the city! Once you are ready to unwind, retreat to our comfy apt with a queen-sized bed and Roku TV. If you prefer to stay in, our little kitchen is equipped with all the basics for cooking, and the living area is not only spacious, but also great for working remotely.

✔ Free Parking
✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ Queen Bed

The space
Welcome to our efficient one-bedroom apartment. We are located on the 2nd floor of a 4-unit apartment building.

A blend of comfort and convenience greets you as soon as you step inside. While decorating this inviting retreat, we have worked hard to create a "2nd home" feeling for you.

The living area is designed as an open concept space, successfully combining the lively living room with a cozy dining area and small, b
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is nestled in the Old North Columbus neighborhood of Columbus, Ohio. This historical area is famous for its local music and its unique, untouched architecture, reminiscent of its old roots. Located north of Ohio State University, this well-connected location allows you to explore the entire city and its surrounding region quickly. The nearby area offers numerous excellent restaurants, stores, and public transport options.

This is not a pretentious neighborhood by any means and is currently in the revitalization phase. We have been in the area for a year and have experienced no crime or safety issues. Our neighborhood is filled with young families, grad students, musicians, and artists. If you are looking for a posh, upscale neighborhood with shops and boutiques, this is probably not the right location for you, but we would be happy to point you in the right direction.
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!

name: The German Carriage Loft • Live in Brewery Dstrct!
description:
Experience Columbus' true character in our updated 2-bedroom penthouse loft across from Schiller Park & German Village - on the top floor of the historic 1800s Carriage House. Location doesn't get any better than this! Walking distance to literally everything German Village has to offer, including our best parks, restaurants, & bars! 5min drive to downtown! Expect some noise (busy street). Free parking!

We wear masks & gloves, and follow extensive cleaning checklists.

The space
Our apartment was designed to blend contemporary finishes with the vintage character of this building from the late 1800's. It is equipped with original hardwood columns, brick accents, an updated kitchen, & stainless steel appliances. This glowing space invites you to explore Columbus' most charming and lively community situated between German Village and the Brewery District.

Please NOTE: There are 3 steep flights of stairs to access our loft apartment. The stairway
neighborhood_overview: Our loft is immediately west of German Village and front-facing on High Street in the Brewery District. Full of lively entertainment and dining options and home to one of the nation's largest independent book stores. It is further enhanced by the historic & beautiful 23-acre Schiller Park, which has the lovely Huntington Garden, dozens of mature oak trees, a pond, tennis courts, picnic area, and people walking their dogs. Walking distance to large grocery store. 5 Minutes from Downtown Columbus, Steps to German Village, 10 minutes from Ohio State Campus and Ohio Stadium, 5 Minutes to the Columbus Convention center, 10 Minutes from the Columbus Airport, 5 Minutes to Nationwide Children’s Hospital, within walking distance to 12 highly-rated restaurants!

It is further enhanced by the historic & beautiful 23-acre Schiller Park, which has the lovely Huntington Garden, dozens of mature oak trees, a pond, tennis courts, picnic area, and people walking their dogs. 5 Minutes from Downtown Columbus, 10 minutes from Ohio State Campus & Ohio Stadium, 5 Minutes to the Columbus Convention center, 10 Minutes from the CMH Airport, 5 Minutes to Nationwide Children’s Hospital, within walking distance to 12 highly-rated restaurants! Walking distance to large grocery store.
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!

name: The Gallerie Loft | German Village | Nationwide
description:
Located in the heart of German Village, this super unique, mini studio loft has top finishes, stainless steel appliances, vaulted ceilings, and is a minute's walk to beautiful Schiller Park, the best eateries, coffeeshops and shopping that German Village has to offer. It’s one mile from downtown, a quick Uber drive from the Short North, Convention Center, Arena District and CMH airport. This loft is perfect for a single guest or a couple visiting our historic neighborhood! *NO PARTIES*"

The space
The space is a converted carriage house loft above in the back of my property. The bathroom is beautifully renovated with natural marble tile and a custom glass shower, but is VERY small due to the nature of the space. So, if you're a particularly large and/or tall person, or have claustrophobia, please consider one of my other listings on the property that are full-sized. Just send me a note!

Mega-listing! If you're planning an event, like a wedding, I have
neighborhood_overview: German Village is memorable for a thousand reasons, all of which are intimately personal to the individuals fortunate to reside in or visit the neighborhood. The sense of community is palpable, the historic architecture is beautiful, and the history is visible. German Village is not easily forgotten. From walkability to a great sense of community, German Village is an incredible place to be. You feel it when you cross through the Third Street gateway or explore the parks. Millions of individual bricks were placed on top of one another to form this Village.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer splitting my time between Columbus, Manhattan, and Barcelona. My wife and I travel all over the country and world, now with our two little boys. We're Superhosts ourselves, which make us very courteous guests and will always leave your place tidy upon our departure, just as we’d hope you’d treat our home.  

Check out our listings if you’re interested in staying at one of our properties in Columbus. From a stunning 3 bedroom Mid-century modern home in Bexley to turn of the century historic brick homes in the heart of German Village. You're covered on your next trip to Columbus whether looking for a weekend retreat, a relaxing place to call home during a business trip, attending a convention, a wedding, or in need of longer-term accommodations for your medical residency or stint as a professor at OSU!
We look forward to hosting you!

description:
Stylish Downtown Art Pad in Franklinton, ideal for long stays. Our newly renovated twin single has a well equipped designer kitchen with two bedrooms, washer & dryer and one car detached garage with opener. Enjoy the company of the artwork throughout, many original pieces compliment the living areas. The Franklinton Arts District is just down Rich St. and include Restaurants like BrewDog, Landgrant Brewing, Yellow Brick Pizza, Galleries and More. Easy access to Downtown Columbus and freeways.

The space
Enjoy the open living floor plan with gallery inspiration and some original works of art throughout this town home. Our designer kitchen is well equipped with cookware, toaster oven, blender, coffee maker, and plenty of glass ware for your different beverage needs. The art includes dining in our original Herman Miller chairs (Please be careful with them, they have lasted a long time - very comfy:) The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, granite counters, dini
neighborhood_overview: Franklinton is the new up and coming area in Columbus. Our town house property backs to Mount Carmel's College of Nursing residence. To the right of the property is open green space also owned and maintained by Mount Carmel. Next to Mount Carmel is going a $100 million residential and retail development. There are new homes being built in Franklinton and many properties are in the transitional and rehab process including the one across the street which should be done this winter. The Franklinton Arts District is just down Rich St. a half mile and include Restaurants like BrewDog, Landgrant Brewing, Yellow Brick Pizza, Galleries and More. Easy access to Downtown Columbus, OSU, and freeways. Long term custom stays available beyond the current 3 months of booking dates, just let us know what you need.
host_about: Scott & Amy Welcome you to Columbus. We have been residents in the Columbus area for more than 25 years and both attended The Ohio State University. Scott is a Residential Realtor in Columbus.  We have worked at planning and decorating our twin single and hope our guests experience the best!

Guets are treated to a true loft with 20ft ceilings, original brick floors + walls!

This is truly a unique Airbnb experience and a rare find!!!

The space
This is a true renovated industrial loft apartment with 20ft + ceilings and HUGE widows to allow plenty of light. All windows have roller shades as well for privacy when needed.

Guests are treated to a slice of history while enjoying first class amenities. The home features tasteful decor, exposed brick walls, polished concrete floors, stainless steel appliances, & granite counters, all the while providing all the amenities for an easy & enjoyable trip, including: hi speed WI-Fi, smart T.V with cable, towels + linens, shampoo + conditioner, coffee/tea.
neighborhood_overview: The Short North is the most vibrant neighborhood in Columbus. name: Charming Clintonville Guest Suite
description:
Be our guest at this charming Clintonville guest suite (private space inside a larger home) located on a quiet street in a safe neighborhood - and just a 4-minute walk from the fabulous Northstar Cafe on High Street!

The space
This is a fully private guest suite inside of a single family home. It has its own dedicated entrance and private bathroom. You will not have access to the kitchen (just the minifridge and microwave shown in the basement).

There are long-term tenants living in the other part of the home, but they have their own entrance and you will not need to interact with them or have any shared spaces.

You will park on the street and enter through the front door into the front room where the beds are set up. This is one large room, with a queen bed at one end and two twins at the other end. Please note: there is a door in this room that separates the back part of the house. It will be locked from both sides, and has an addition
neighborhood_overview:
Not kidding here: Clintonville was recently named the "Nicest Place in Ohio" by Reader's Digest. Here's a short excerpt from the article:

The Clintonville neighborhood in Columbus, Ohio is an older area of the city filled with a wealth of houses built in the early 1900’s, stately old trees, parks, shops, restaurants and possibly the highest density of Toyota Priuses per capita of anywhere you’ll find. The sense of community is really impressive here and our neighborhood recently gained national attention when two young aspiring musicians put on a porch recital for their 78 year old neighbor Helena Schlam while she was sheltering in place at home.
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

Brian Harp

This apartment is ideal for a couple or small groups to eat together, hang out, relax, explore the surrounding areas, chat and have fun.

name: Healthy body & soul bnb
description:
The home is centrally located in a diverse community of Columbus. It is within approx 5-7 mins from OSU, Columbus State Univ, Fairgrounds, Mapfre Stadium, the malls and airport.

The space
The space is home of business/ fitness service "Healthy Soul Fitness" turned Airbnb. The fitness equipment is still there for Airbnb guests to use freely. It is located on a relatively busy urban street - there will be some city vibes there. The serial-entrepreneur (Gail) conducts most business off-site now but occasionally stops by - with advanced notice. There are 2 bedrooms, 1 and 1/2 bath, full kitchen and livingroom with a small desk/ workstation available for Airbnb guests to get some R&R and burn some cals. in one place.
The backyard is fenced in and has fruit trees gifting during the summer. There is off-street parking out back outside of the fence.

Guest access
Guests have 2 off-street parking spaces available to use in back of the home.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the mix.  Many open minded awesome professionals have enjoyedvtheir stays and are always welcome here. It is centrally located to so many main attractions, events and  Columbus travel points.
host_about:
I am a life-long learner and enjoy a variety of experiences.  As a real estate Maven, Nurse, Entrepreneur and Community Advocate I  have a passion for healthy lifestyle.  Also have faith in GOoDness,  enjoy rest on SONdays, care for others (including "fur" babies) & appreciate good friends who help keep me grounded.  My favorite experiences involve friendly folks, sunshine, water,  flowers and gentle nature.   
A most memorable saying my mom used to say was "every dog has its day"... It all pans out well ultimately. 
Welcome wonderful shared experiences!

name: Carriage House near Franklin Park
description:
A freshly remodeled Carriage House near Franklin Park Conservatory features new everything including appliances and washer and dryer. Two bedrooms, one bathroom, full kitchen along with a dining space, living space, and office complete this house. It's a short walk to Franklin Park and a quick drive to downtown and short north. The Convention Center is 7 minute drive and OSU is a 13 minute drive.

The space
The Carriage House is accessible by parking on the side of the main house, and walking to the rear alley entrance door. Exposed brick, bright windows, concrete floor, and tall ceilings give a warm industrial vibe. Enjoy the personal touches of handmade artwork.
WIFI information will be provided.

Absolutely no smoking or burning anything of any kind. If violated a $250 cleaning fee will be charged. If smoking outside, dispose trash in alley dumpsters, do not bring trash inside.

Guest access
Guests are limited to using the
neighborhood_overview: We stayed in the Carriage House as the first guests, and had a great time. There are nearby local areas a short Uber ride away. Olde Towne East has restaurants and shops worth visiting, specifically Olde Towne Tavern and Camelot Cellars. There's a pickup only family owned spot called What the Waffle. Franklin Park Conservatory is an awesome 5 minute walk away, a must visit for anyone.
host_about:
I'm hosting on Airbnb because I no longer live in half of my duplex property, and I enjoy sharing it's charming space with visitors looking to be just outside of downtown Columbus.  I enjoy all kinds of art, music, dance and food.  Wine, shoes, and dessert are my weaknesses.  I love traveling of all kinds, short road trips or long vacations. I hope my guests enjoy the passion and warmth I've put into my century old property. Thanks for your inquiry!

Throughout my busy days, I enjoy taking a moment to breathe in the world, and no matter how stressful or challenging life can become, I always find time to admire how huge and beautiful life is around me, and my challenges don't seem as extreme anymore.

neighborhood_overview:
ABOUT GERMAN VILLAGE

You are in one of the best parts of Columbus, Ohio—beautiful and historic German Village. There is so much to see and do and most of the area is pedestrian friendly.

We have our favorite eateries including Barcelona, Sycamore Café, Brown Bag Deli, Winans, Pistachio Vera, The Kitchen, Lindey’s, Katzinger’s, G Michaels, Skillet, Village Coney, Schmidt's, Thurmans, Fox in the Snow, Antiques on High (brewery), Alpine, Smoked on High BBQ….. Check out German Village Society for details.

For fitness options, there is a Snap Fitness facility on Third Ave and Schiller Rec Center in the Park (both are fee-based).

Bike and scooter rentals are nearby.

name: The Frog Cabin
description:
Take a step back in time at The Frog Cabin! A log cabin rich in history, nestled in a modern neighborhood close to many amenities.

The original structure was built in 1840 in Wilkesville, Ohio and relocated to its current location in 1936. Each log was carefully numbered, disassembled and restored to its original specifications in Clintonville.

The entire home has just been updated with new bathrooms, kitchen, and appliances while still preserving and enhancing the natural character.

The space
Original log cabin dating back to 1840 located in the heart of Clintonville. Located close to the Park of Roses, Whetstone Park, bike trail and Whetstone library. Many amazing restaurants within walking distance.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview: Franklin Park neighborhood is conveniently located around the renowned Franklin Park Conservatory & Botanical Gardens. This area is up and coming, with the new Trolley District planning to open in July 2021.
host_about: We are a local couple and very excited to welcome guests to our city! After getting married and starting a family, we relocated back to Columbus in 2017.  While we maintain our love of traveling to new places, we now look forward to making your stay in our city as memorable as possible.  We take pride in offering our guests an impeccably clean place to stay,  excellent communication, and a high level of service.

name: Ohio Hideaway
description:
Welcome to our home! Our Airbnb is a 3 bedroom unit that is less than 1/2 mile or 3 blocks from Nationwide Children's hospital in Downtown Columbus. We hope to provide a comfortable home away from home for families who may be in the area for care at Nationwide Children's Hospital, attending one of Columbus's many events and attractions, or visiting family or friends in the Columbus area! My partner Kevin and I are experienced Airbnb Superhosts with 2 additional Airbnb units in Columbus.

The space
Completely remodeled 3 bedroom condo in the heart of downtown Columbus!
-New kitchen and bathroom with modern finishes
-Smart lock with keypad for keyless check-in and entry at any time
-King size bed in master bedroom
-Pillow top mattress
-Bedside lamps with built in outlets for charging devices
-Ceiling fans in all bedrooms
-Blinds and darkening curtains on all bedroom windows
-Towel hooks in bedrooms and bathroom
-Pull out
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood surrounding our home is currently transitioning, with many of the homes in the area being renovated and restored. Our home is one of these homes that has recently been completely renovated. Nationwide Children's Hospital is investing heavily into the surrounding area, helping to make it one of Columbus's many "up and coming" neighborhoods. As a result you will see many beautifully renovated homes right next door to homes that are still boarded up. We ask that you please acknowledge that you understand and are comfortable with the neighborhood prior to booking your stay. We recommend utilizing an online map service to understand where exactly the home is, and to browse around the neighborhood.  We are more than happy to answer any and all questions you may have!
host_about:
Hello! My partner Kevin and I are experienced Airbnb hosts in Columbus, OH. I'm an Ohio native, born and raised in Northwest Ohio. I graduated undergrad from The Ohio State University, moved to Chicago where I lived and worked for a few years, and have now happily settled back down in Columbus for the past 6+ years. I work for L Brands, the parent company of Victoria's Secret and Bath & Body Works, one of the many retail companies headquartered here in Columbus. I'm a Supply Chain and Logistics professional, and recently completed my Masters of Business Administration at Purdue University.
I enjoy traveling whenever and wherever I can, though I definitely prefer someplace warmer when given the option :) Though I love traveling, I am a Columbus fanboy at heart and am always happy to talk about all of the great things to experience here. I'm a very easy going guy, so feel free to ask me any questions that may be on your mind! Happy traveling!

neighborhood_overview:
The Short North is a hip, culture-rich area centered on N high Street.

Contemporary galleries fill converted warehouses, and the Wexner Center for the Arts hosts boundary-pushing exhibitions. Shops selling records, streetwear, and vintage clothes are interersed with student-packed coffehouses, craft-beer bars, and casual eateries.

Programming at Short North Stage spans musicals and cutting-edge drama. Enjoy endless mimosas and a boutique like brunch at Forno Kitchen and bar.

Enjoy the most tasty coffee in all of Columbus at Northstar Cafe. Enjoy a fantastic steak with fine dining to match at Hyde Park.

If more low scale is your thing, but your wanting steak. Ruth's Chris is a short drive away. Maybe a gourmet burger is more your style, you can make sure to enjoy one by going to Bareburger.

Maybe in the mood for Italian? Martini Modern Italian has you covered and is less than 10 minutes away from the condo. Another amazing dinn
host_about: My name is Jordan Ferguson, I’m the CEO of Home Is Where The Heart Is. What I want for all my guests is simple, I want to create an experience that they never forget. When they think of Columbus, we want them to think of us. We’re a home away from home for a few and an escape from the hustle n bustle of the city. How is this possible you might ask? Well simply because home is where the heart is.

name: Close to OSU CAMPUS | Trendy Loft | Designer Finishes
description:
Spacious loft with designer finishes and luxury amenities! This Carriage home, or apartment above a garage, is a 1 bedroom and 1 lofted bed apartment.

The original carriage house collapsed and the owner spent the summer of 2020 rebuilding it from the remaining bricks up. He made much of the furniture and decor himself out of the old roof rafters; an ode to the history!

This apartment boasts a full kitchen that's open to the living room, full bathroom, and in-unit washer and dryer!

The private bedroom has a king size bed, small dresser, and full closet with shelf —in case you're staying longer than just a few days.

The second sleeping area is a lofted space that is *only accessible via a ladder* over the kitchen in the main living space. It's got a queen size bed, plenty of pillows, and comfy bedding.

name: Bright + Central 2BR | High-Speed Wifi | Kitchen
description:
Live easy in our updated two-bed apartment located a 5-minute drive from anywhere Downtown and a short walk from Nationwide. Across the street from community gardens, this home is the perfect base for a hassle-free stay. Not the best area of town as you drive up, but it has never felt unsafe in our 1.5 years here. Cook up a storm in the fully-equipped kitchen or sink into soft queen-beds with fresh linens. Time to explore? Enjoy easy access to highways and the independent bars & cafes of Oak St!

The space
Our apartment is close to the center of the historic Olde Towne East neighborhood and an easy five-minute drive from Downtown Columbus. This is a transitional area, and not the best area of town, but it has never felt unsafe in the last 1.5 years that we've lived and worked nearby. You may get some street noise from Main St. Located in a secure brick 4-unit apartment building.

You’ll enter the property using a secure deadbolt keypad on the front door.
neighborhood_overview:
Olde Towne East is one of Columbus’ most historic districts. This is a gentrifying neighborhood where beautiful, old buildings meet the vibrancy of modern-day living. Coffee shops, independent stores and lovely restaurants all sit happily alongside each other, and are just a 10 minute walk from the house.

This is a transitional area still in the revitalization phase, but it has never felt unsafe in the last 1.5 years that we've lived and worked nearby. If you are looking for an upscale neighborhood with posh shops and boutiques, this is probably not the right listing for you. We'd be happy to point you in the right direction :)

Olde Towne East is very popular with residents due to its close proximity to Downtown. Hop in an UBER and you’ll be no further than 5 to 10 minutes from any address in Downtown, making this a perfect apartment for business travelers too. Free street parking is available if you are driving yourself.

We’re also located close to the
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!

Coffee shops, independent stores and lovely restaurants all sit happily alongside each other, and are just a 10 minute walk from the house.

This is a transitional area still in the revitalization phase, but it has never felt unsafe in the last 1.5 years that we've lived and worked nearby. If you are looking for an upscale neighborhood with posh shops and boutiques, this is probably not the right listing for you. We'd be happy to point you in the right direction :)

Olde Towne East is very popular with residents due to its close proximity to Downtown. Hop in an UBER and you’ll be no further than 5 to 10 minutes from any address in Downtown, making this a perfect apartment for business travelers too. Free street parking is available if you are driving yourself.

description:
Located along a quiet tree-lined street is our beautiful 2-bedroom home within a charming, working-class neighborhood just a short drive from downtown Columbus and the buzz of German Village.

Open and spacious, the house features a fully equipped kitchen, a modern central bathroom and two sun-filled bedrooms that overlook the neighborhood below.

Outside there is a shared yard as well as a charming front porch, the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee while watching the world go by.

The space
~ Keep in mind that you will be sharing a wall with the tenant next door. Expect some noise as they go about their day. ~

Make your way up to the front porch and enter via the easy electronic keypad with no need for keys.

Step inside and be greeted with a cozy living room filled with a plush sofa surrounding a faux brick fireplace and a wall-mounted TV with access to all your favorite streaming apps.

Continue throug
neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located right in the heart of Downtown Columbus within the historic Merion Village which has roots dating back to the early 1800s. This is a working-class, family neighborhood that has seen many updates in recent years.

Stay just a short walk from the Scioto River, with multiple parks lying along the river’s edge as part of the Scioto Mile, this 175-acre parkland features a free outdoor climbing wall and an Audubon center frequented by nature enthusiasts.

Enjoy a meal at the Thurman Café on Thurman Avenue, a classic American steakhouse and burger joint or venture a few blocks north to charming bakeries and cafes in the neighboring Brewery District.

Museums, shopping, top dining and the beautiful parks and gardens of Downtown Columbus are only a short 10 minutes from the house. Play at Legoland, discover the city zoo or enjoy a movie at the cinema with all the attractions of the city right only minutes away.

The space

When you arrive, you will be greeted with easy street parking, a smooth self check-in process, and high-speed WiFi. The home includes a wonderful balcony with seating, a spacious living room and separate dining room, along with a fully-stocked kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Both bedrooms offer queen-size beds, while one of them provides you with a desk for your workspace needs. A sofa bed is offer
neighborhood_overview: Franklin Park neighborhood is conveniently located around the renowned Franklin Park Conservatory & Botanical Gardens. Franklin Park is centrally located, just east of Downtown, near Olde Town East and Bexley. Walking through the surrounding area, you will see historic mansions, many of which are in the midst of being renovated to their former glory. This area is up and coming, with the new Trolley District planning to open in July 2021.
host_about: We are a local couple and very excited to welcome guests to our city! After getting married and starting a family, we relocated back to Columbus in 2017.  While we maintain our love of traveling to new places, we now look forward to making your stay in our city as memorable as possible.  We take pride in offering our guests an impeccably clean place to stay,  excellent communication, and a high level of service.

Up stairs there are 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. 1 bedroom has 3 double beds, another bedroom has 2 double beds. The 3rd room has 1 bed. Lots of sleeping op
neighborhood_overview:
Milo-Grogan is a historic neighborhood close to downtown Columbus. With many historic homes and buildings, this is a lot of new development coming in to this area.

Our house is very close the COTA bus stop on Cleveland Ave and 2nd Ave. This is a direct line from the Columbus Airport.

name: Stylish Sun-Filled Apt ✸ Walk to Main St & Bexley
description:
Located along a green leafy street in a charming neighborhood is this bright, chic apt within walking distance to Main St, Capital University and only a short drive to Downtown.

The apartment features a spacious living room filled with natural light, a reading alcove, a ROKU TV, a fully equipped kitchen, a beautiful canopy queen bedroom.

Walk to many restaurants along Main St, treat yourself to a coffee at Starbucks or an ice cream at Johnsons, then pick up a pizza at Donatos for a night in.

The space
**NOTE — The apartment is on the ground floor of the building and has thin walls. Expect some noise coming from the family in the upstairs apartments.**

Make your way into the apartment using the keypad for an easy keyless check in and be greeted with a sun-filled living room complete with a plush sofa, a smart wall mounted ROKU TV and a cozy reading alcove all surrounding the faux fireplace and mantle.

For extra guests,
neighborhood_overview:
The quaint neighborhood of Eastlawn sits right on the edge of Bexley with it’s tree-lined streets, beautiful architecture and small-town charm, is known for its historic walkable Main Street that welcomes visitors to many dining options, art venues, and unique shopping destinations.

Visit the historic Drexel Theatre, Rubino's Pizzeria and Graeter's Ice Cream Parlor, find a stunning array of dining choices to cater to refined palates or try some Turkish delights at Cafe Istanbul, Moshi Sushi Bar, Giuseppe's Ritrovo and Rusty Bucket.

Just a 5-minute walk from the apartment and you will find yourself along the bustling main street. Go for a morning walk to Starbucks, grab a quick lunch at Jimmy Johns or head into Downtown Columbus, a short 10-minute drive away.

host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. name: Housepitality~ The Showstopper, Luxury & Location!
description:
The Showstopper is an incredible place to stay while in Columbus! From the moment you walk in, your group will swoon over the open spaces, and high-end finishes this home has to offer. Our 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home has 5 beds, and sleeps up to 10 people. The open first floor allows for your group to gather in the kitchen, living room, and dinning room together, and enjoy some quality time together in an beautiful surrounding. Not to mention a central location, close to OSU and Downtown!

The space
This Showstopper of a house has been recently renovated to be a bright, airy, oasis for family's and groups to use as a home base while in Columbus. Our space has an open floor plan on the first floor with tall ceilings. Your group will love sharing a meal together in the high-end kitchen/dinning area. There is a full bathroom on the first floor, and a laundry facility as well. Upstairs are 3 bedrooms, and another full luxury bathroom. 2 of the bedrooms have 2 queen be
neighborhood_overview:
Milo-Grogan is a historic neighborhood close to downtown Columbus. With many historic homes and buildings, this is a lot of new development coming in to this area.

We are a short walk to the Short North, and Italian Village area. Our location is central to the city, and can be downtown in 5 min, OSU in 10 min, and most any part of Columbus in 20 min.

Our house is very close the COTA bus stop on Cleveland Ave and 2nd Ave. This is a direct line from the Columbus Airport.
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

description:
The OTE Hideaway 2 has been updated throughout! Our 2 bedroom townhouse has all new appliances in the kitchen and furnishings. All bedrooms have extremely comfortable memory foam mattresses. Furniture, fixtures, and bathroom are all also brand new. The townhouse is located in the heart of Olde Towne East next to many local restaurants and establishments. Our location offers convenient access to downtown, Convention Center, Short North, Nationwide Children's, and Expo Center.

The space
The first floor has living room, dining room, and a gorgeous remodeled kitchen with all the conveniences. The second floor has 1 bedroom a memory foam queen mattress, and one full bathroom. The third floor has a very spacious 2nd bedroom with a queen size bed and queen size air mattress. Parking is not an issue at all as we have one off-street parking space next to the house and plenty of off street parking. We also offer a washer/dryer for your convenience.

This is not an area where loud noise is acceptable or tolerated by the residents.

name: Columbus - Entire Home - Driveway Parking -Firepit
description:
The Seibert house is a stand alone home in an adorable and historic neighborhood. Right down the street is Schiller park. You’re also walking distance to German Villages best restaurants, shops and bars. You’re only a 5 minute drive to downtown Columbus/Short North, and less than 10 to Ohio State campus and the Shoe. No parties please.

The space
This home has great indoor and outdoor space with a large driveway. The large wooden deck feels private with the brick wall and fenced back areas. The outdoor area includes a gas fire pit, charcoal grill, picnic table and additional seating. No parties please

Guest access
Guests have full access to the house and yard surrounding the property. We just ask that you avoid the cleaning supplies closet/stairs.

Other things to note
The home is in a residential area so please be aware that we have neighbors. When you arrive you will want to drive around to the back of the house to p
neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of downtown Columbus, German Village is one of the most atmospheric neighborhoods in the Midwest. Originally built by German settlers in the mid-1800s, the lovingly restored brick houses, shops, streets and sidewalks are full of historic charm and modern swank. Once you get there with a short walk or drive from downtown, the CBUS circulator or CoGo Bike Share , you’ll want to explore the neighborhood on foot.

Historic Schiller Park is less than a 5 min walk directly down the street. Attracts some of the cutest, well trained dogs in the area around 5 pm.

Some spots we love close by! - most are walking distance.

Lindeys - high end - amazing patio.
Planks pizza
Brown Bag Deli
Pistachia Vera
The Book Loft
Hey Heys
Schmidt’s
Barcelona’s
Jenis
Village Coney
Roosters
Buckeye Donuts
host_about:
We are really excited to host people!
Gardiner’s House is run by my husband Danny and I. We love to host and travel so Airbnb seemed like the perfect platform! We want  to give our guests that homey feeling while still being able to experience a new place. 

Danny is the budgetman, delivery man, handyman and anything else you can think of. I’m a teacher that loves a little interior design and baking! 

 We’re here to help as little or as much as you want. Please feel free to reach out with any questions or concerns.

name: Housepitality ~ The Graffiti Haús - German Village
description:
Experience one of Columbus' best place to stay! This German Village gem demonstrates thoughtful design from head to toe. THREE LARGE BEDROOMS, TWO KING BEDS each have their own TV plus TWO FUL SIZE BEDS, third TV in Living Room. Washer/Dryer for your use. Fully equipped dedicated OFFICE w high speed internet. Very work friendly. Walk down the street to highly rated Schiller Park! Within a 5 minute drive to heart of downtown Columbus. Walk to dozens of restaurants, and unique shops!

The space
The Graffiti House is a half of a duplex home. It has 3 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms in this apartment. Parking for 1 car is behind the house.

From the moment you walk in, you will feel like the space was designed for you! Our living room is a great space to catch up with your group around the TV. The dinning room has a large table for the group to share a meal. The kitchen is fully stocked and ready to cook! There is also a half bathroom on the first floor.
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

Entire half a double/duplex!! Beautiful, newly-renovated, fun decor, GREAT LOCATION. Fully equipped dedicated office with high speed internet. Very work friendly. Walk down the street to highly rated Schiller Park! Within a 5 minute drive to heart of downtown Columbus. Walk to dozens of restaurants. The space

neighborhood_overview:
German Village is a historic Columbus community and is known for gorgeous brick streets and architecture. Historic restaurants and bars are prominent within the area and are easily accessibly from our house. 7 Minutes from Downtown Columbus, 10 minutes from Ohio State Campus and Ohio Stadium, 7 Minutes to the Columbus Convention center, 15 Minutes from the Columbus Airport, 5 Minutes to Nationwide Children’s Hospital, and very close to 12 4+ Star rated restaurants on Yelp! Our house is a 5 minute walk to a large grocery store.

A warm, charming, historical, and walk-able neighborhood which is also a diverse and friendly community. It is further enhanced by large (23 acre) and well-kept Schiller Park, which has the lovely Huntington Garden, dozens of mature trees, a lake, tennis courts, picnic area, and people walking their dogs.

name: Boho Chic Getaway
description:
Unwind in our newly renovated boho chic getaway! This modern, sun-drenched apartment offers a tranquil residential vibe alongside quick, easy access to the downtown areas. Soak in the clawfoot tub, then fall asleep in one of our relaxing spacious bedrooms. And when you wake up, the espresso machine awaits.

Located on the south side of CBUS just outside German Village, we are only 5 minutes from downtown area. On our street you will find a cool vegan cafe/bookstore as well as coffee shop!

The space
Our unit offers groups and families a fun and enjoyable space that will make you feel at home! The first bedroom has a queen bed and single bed and the other bedroom has a queen bed. In the living area you will find two sleeper sofas that are comfortable to sleep at night and can be easily rolled up during the day when not needed.

neighborhood_overview: Our condo is immediately west of German Village, primarily oriented along High and Front Streets, in the Brewery District. Full of lively entertainment and dining options and the country’s largest resident theater company. It is further enhanced by large (23 acre) and well-kept Schiller Park, which has the lovely Huntington Garden, dozens of mature trees, a lake, tennis courts, picnic area, and people walking their dogs. 5 Minutes from Downtown Columbus, Steps to German Village, 10 minutes from Ohio State Campus and Ohio Stadium, 5 Minutes to the Columbus Convention center, 10 Minutes from the Columbus Airport, 5 Minutes to Nationwide Children’s Hospital, within walking distance to 12 4+ Star rated restaurants on Yelp!, walking distance to a large grocery store, and walking distance to the aforementioned Schiller Park. A warm, charming, historical, and walkable neighborhood which is also a diverse and friendly community.

The space
This building was purchased by my Great Grandmother in 1932. She was a very progressive business woman for her time and I’m proud to carry on her legacy. She also owned a farm 30 miles from here where the art in the apt was created in our cabin studio. name: Housepitality-Central City Nest C- Great Location!
description:
The Central City Nest is a cozy spot to stay on your visit to Columbus. You will love the updated walk-in shower and brand new kitchen as well. Our 3-bedroom 1-bathroom apartment is in a central location to the city. Just a 5 minute drive north of Downtown Columbus, and 8 minutes to OSU! Our 2nd floor space has been well appointed for your visit, with a charming aesthetic, and stocked with quality items to make your stay a great one. Don't miss our balcony, a perfect place to enjoy a drink!

The space
Our 3 bedroom apartment is part of a 4 unit apartment building. We have parking space in the back, and there is also street parking available. Our apartment has just been renovated, and fully stocked for your stay! Enjoy our living room with your group, or .... binge watch your favorite show alone! Our updated kitchen is smaller, but a great place to prepare a quick meal. Our bedrooms are stocked with comfortable beds, storage options, and the feel of home!
neighborhood_overview:
Wineland Park is a historic neighborhood close to downtown Columbus. With many historic homes and buildings, this is a lot of new development coming in to this area. Our house is on a busy one-way street, across from a urban farm!

We are a short walk to the Short North, and Italian Village area. Our location is central to the city, and can be downtown in, OSU, and most any part of Columbus in 5 - 20 min.

Our house is very close the COTA bus stop on Cleveland Ave and 2nd Ave. This is a direct line from the Columbus Airport.
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: Old-school 70s Apt • City Views in German Village!
description:
Located along a leafy tree-lined street is this funky 70’s style apartment with the charming cobblestone streets and historic brick buildings of German Village right on your doorstep.

The apartment sits opposite the Nationwide Children’s Hospital and is only a 2-minute walk to Starbucks, perfect for the morning coffee run!

And with Downtown Columbus and the Short North just a 5-minute drive away you couldn't be better located to experience everything the city has to offer.

The space
Park your car in the free parking space and make your way into the apartment via the easy keyless electronic lock. Step inside and be greeted with sun-filled rooms, views of the neighborhood and the Downtown skyline and bright 70’s style with plenty of character.

Relax in the retro living area with a plush sofa surrounding the original faux fireplace and a big 4k ROKU TV, perfect for a movie night in watching all the classics. The sofa can also fold do
neighborhood_overview:
This historic neighborhood of German Village with its cobblestone roads, tree lined streets, beautiful brick homes, cute coffee shops, and awesome restaurants and bars is where you want to be when visiting Columbus.

The apartment is right in the heart of German Village facing Livingston Ave that is full of lively entertainment and dining options and home to one of the nation's largest independent bookstores. It is further enhanced by the historic & beautiful 23-acre Schiller Park, which has the lovely Huntington Garden, dozens of mature oak trees, a pond, tennis courts, picnic area, and people walking their dogs.

Just across the road from the apartment is the Nationwide Children’s Hospital. Get your morning coffee fix at the Starbucks an easy 3-minute walk away as well as a large supermarket only 15 mins down the road. You are a 5-minute drive from Downtown Columbus, Steps to German Village, 7 minutes from Ohio State Campus and Ohio Stadium, 7 Minutes to the Colu
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!

name: ⭐️Beautiful Modern Condo w/ Balcony⭐️
description:
Luxurious 1 bedroom condo! Located just 15 minutes outside of downtown columbus. Perfect area for those looking to be close to the city, but want to avoid the traffic and commotion of everyday city life. A short drive to shops, bars, cinemas, Ohio State University, and many other attractions in downtown Columbus. Free ample parking. 1st floor unit with wheelchair accessible walk up. Great for couples looking to get a way or anyone who wants to stay in luxury while staying in Columbus.

The space
COVID-19 PRECAUTIONS
Nothing is more important to us than the health and safety of our communities. We are monitoring the situation very closely, and we would like to share the additional precautions that have been recently added. All amenities at this property have been closed. We have increased our cleaning standards, specifically as it relates to cleaning and disinfecting surfaces. This is all very necessary for the safety of our guests, and we must do our part to
neighborhood_overview: Set in between Upper Arlington and Clintonville. The perfect place to be in Columbus. You have all the luxuries of a busy city being 10 minutes away, but you're secluded from all the congestion and noises from the city. Quite and relaxing atmosphere if thats what your looking for. Downtown Columbus is a short 10 minute drive away. You can access the 315 freeway that is near the condo. The airport is ten minutes as well. Everything is at your fingertips or a short drive away. This condo is located in a great up and coming area in Columbus. Perfect for any traveler or anyone looking to get away!
host_about: My name is Jordan Ferguson, I’m the CEO of Home Is Where The Heart Is. What I want for all my guests is simple, I want to create an experience that they never forget. When they think of Columbus, we want them to think of us. We’re a home away from home for a few and an escape from the hustle n bustle of the city. How is this possible you might ask? Well simply because home is where the heart is.

name: The Historic Central Condo - Arena, Short North, Convention #1
description:
The Downtown Dreamer is the premier located condo accommodation in Columbus. Directly facing Goodale Park on its Southwest corner, its best in class location is a few minutes (250 feet to 1/2 a mile) walking distance to all of your Convention Center, Nationwide Arena District, Short North and Downtown recreational and business endeavors.

First off all, our space gets its best ratings due to its amazing location. It's truly one of the best being directly a crossed from one of the most beautiful parks in all of Columbus, Goodale Park. That being stated, it's right off 670 where it meets Goodale so it does come with a bit of street noise. Although our home is a bit older, this space comes fully furnished with all of your modern lodging accommodations including a full kitchen with a full set of dishes, cooking utensils, high end dishwasher, oven, microwave and stove top. name: Franklinton Arts District - Stunning Rooftop Views
description:
Amazing location just a couple blocks from Land-Grant Brewing, BrewDog, Strongwater Food and Spirits, 400 West Rich and the Idea Foundry. Within walking distance of Downtown, the Scioto Mile, COSI, and the National Veterans Memorial and Museum. Located in the heart of the Franklinton Arts District, with a stunning view of the downtown skyline. Just a 13 minute drive from CMH and 8 minute drive from the Short North and OSU.

The space
NO PARTIES
NO COLUMBUS BASED/LOCAL GUESTS - If you are a Columbus based guest, and not planning a party, please feel free to inquire. On rare occasions we will accept Columbus based guests.

My husband and I built this four unit apartment building in 2018 after falling in love with the neighborhood. This penthouse apartment occupies the entire third and fourth floors, as well as both private rooftop patios. Enjoy a meal on the outdoor farm table, or relax with a drink and enjoy the sunset in the outdoor living sp
neighborhood_overview: Franklinton is such a special neighborhood - it's the home of many go-to restaurants, art galleries, cafes and breweries in Columbus, but also the neighborhood that you can discover new gems if you take the time to explore.  Franklinton is unique in that it is walking distance to downtown Columbus, yet maintains a quiet neighborhood field.  You can easily explore Franklinton, and surrounding areas, by foot, bike or rentable motorized scooter.

description:
This charming 3 bedroom/2 bathroom, two-story unit is new to the scene! Enjoy a full kitchen, laundry room, and great living space overlooking THE SHOE! FREE Complimentary Wifi Enjoy stylish accents, roof top terraces, 24-hour gym access, private conference rooms, billiards, a community event space and dynamic views of THE Ohio State University & The Olentangy trail! Step outside your apartment and you'll have unparalleled walking access to St. John Arena and Ohio Stadium, Fisher College of Business, Jesse Owens Rec Center, shopping, dining, and entertainment. Right down the street are great restaurants and coffee shops such as Starbucks, Chipotle, Buffalo Wild Wings, Varsity Club, Panera Bread, and a CVS Pharmacy if anything is needed! 

Please note this is a two-story unit with an amazing spiral staircase connecting the two floors!

description:
Welcome to our newest Columbus urban environment apartment community.
With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location. Perfect for a weekend away or business travel, this property will not disappoint. Here at Harlow your location is your biggest amenity!
We made a list of the urban hotspots that are steps from your front door!
The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.

name: New listing Historical hidden gem near OSU, MAPFRE
description:
Enjoy our 1920's home with a spacious backyard in the heart of Clintonville within walking distance of restaurants and breweries. Close to OSU, MAPFRE, Glen Echo park, and Park of Roses. Home is well appointed, newly remodeled with a fully equipped kitchen. Yard with gorgeous deck, gas grill, and games. Our space is perfect for gathering family or friends making new memories.

The space
Stay in our 1,500 square foot home in Clintonville

Spend the morning relaxing on the porch swing with cup of coffee in hand. Enjoy the spacious living room with large comfy sectional and plenty of additional seating with smart TV to binge watch all your favorite shows.

The kitchen is complete with solid surface countertops, gas range, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, blender and coffee pot. It is fully stocked with dishes and cookware. The dining room easily seats 8. Guests are welcome to pick tomatoes and peppers as well as use the herbs from our garden
neighborhood_overview:
Located in Clintonville just north of The Ohio State University in Columbus.

This trendy area is full of character with casual restaurants, ice cream, breweries, antique shops and local movie theater within walking distance.

We are 2 miles to The Ohio State University campus, 3 miles to The Short North, 4 miles to Downtown and the Arena District

The home is very close to MAPFRE stadium, The Ohio State University including The Ohio Stadium & The Schottenstein Center and the Ohio State Fairgrounds / Celeste Center. All of which are easily accessible walking, biking or by scooter to avoid traffic & parking.

This home is steps away from Glen Echo Ravine and a short jog/bike ride to the Olentangy Trail - a paved bike/running trail winding along the Olentangy River from Downtown to northern suburbs connecting multiple parks.

Our Newly Renovated Home is in the beautiful Italian Village/Short North area.

Seconds away from N High Street and minutes away from the convention center, local bars, restaurants, or OSU’s Campus.

With this home, you’ll be able to enjoy all Columbus has to offer without being too close to have it impact your well-deserved sleep.

Stainless Steel appliances,
Fully stocked kitchen
Spacious open layout
4k TVs perfect for games or your favorite movie
High-quality furniture
A stunning entertainment spot right outback

After a long day filled with activities, you’ll have the option of privately enjoying the company of your guests outback while watching a game with a drink in hand.

There are four ample-sized bedrooms all wit
neighborhood_overview:
Italian Village/Short North is a very unique area as it has everything to offer no matter what your point of travel is. Plenty of nightlife, and there is plenty of areas where you can relax and enjoy peace and quiet.

Right, when you step outside our Lovely house you will be steps away from North Hight Street, or other words The Short North. As you start to walk left or right and go back behind the house your steps away from The Melt Bar, Famous Town Hall, Union, Seesaw, Short North Pint House, Bakersfield, Forno, The Rossi Kitchen, North Star Cafe, Short North Food Hall, Goody Boy, and many others!

There is parking for 2 cars that is located back behind the house (until August 2021 - construction starts then NO free parking). Any other cars would need to be parked out on the street or at a meter on North High Street that is PAID. There's also Hubbard Parking Garage I suggest parking in and then ubering or walking over to the house as well.

neighborhood_overview: Olde Towne East is going through a steady growth upswing. Homes are being renovated and new families are welcomed. Young families are making a return to the community. Olde Towne East is going through a major renovation due to a string of new businesses emerging. A series of bars, eateries and varied other businesses have opened up between Bryden Road and Broad Street in the Parsons Avenue business corridor. host_about: Hi there! I am are excited to host you during your stay! Being the avid travelers my family and I are, we love the experience AirBNB has provided being able to experience life as one of the locals wherever we are going. We wanted to give the same experience to people visiting our properties and be able to provide the most incredible accommodations to all guests. We obsess over every detail and have an incredible team to ensure our properties are cleaned and maintained to the highest standard prior to your visit. Our guests' book with us for a reason, and we'd love to host you for you to find out why. Currently we are helping homeowners from across the country manage their investment properties / vacation rentals by welcoming guests into their homes through our property management business, Househiker. We are a hands-on short term rental management company and handle all the logistical work that goes into managing short term rentals. Showcasing these properties to look their best and bring in higher returns for our partners and investors is just a small part of what we do. If you like the idea of short term rentals, but simply don't want to handle the day to day management of dealing with guests, coordinating maid staff and maintenance, managing your calendar, and marketing your property to earn the highest nightly rates possible, feel free to contact us and we'd be happy to have a complimentary consultation with you and see if we are a good fit for your needs. We look forward to serving you and making your short term rental experience as hands off as possible and something you’ll love for years to come! We hope you enjoy your stay with us and can experience everything our amazing properties have to offer! Cheers, Christopher, Founder Househiker.

name: The Cottage | Parking + Private Patio + Fast WiFi
description:
The cottage is a unique and charming single-family home in the vibrant Short North neighborhood. Coming in just under 1000 square feet, this was a "tiny house" before they were cool. This is a standalone house with one dedicated outdoor parking spot and a private outdoor dining area nestled into the fenced-in back patio. The home is one block from Neil Ave. in historic Victorian Village.

The space
The home sits just behind a larger home, tucked away from the noise and traffic of a busier street.

Outdoors: the off-street parking spot is great for most cars and SUVs, but might be a little tight for larger vehicles or trucks. The back patio features a dining table for 6.

First floor: Kitchen, living room, and full bathroom.
Second floor: Larger bedroom (queen bed) and smaller bedroom (two twin beds).
Basement: Washer and dryer.

Guest access
You'll have private access to the entire home and outdoor patio.

name: 5 Min to Downtown ♛ Cozy Modern 2BR with Wifi & AC
description:
Check-in and chillout in our stylish two-bed apt located a 5-min drive from anywhere Downtown and a short walk from Nationwide. Not the best area of town as you drive up, but it has never felt unsafe in our 1.5 years here. Cook up a storm in the fully-equipped kitchen or sink into soft queen-beds with fresh linens. Across the street from community gardens, this home is the perfect base for a hassle-free stay. Time to explore? Enjoy easy access to highways and independent bars & cafes of Oak St!

The space
Our apartment is close to the center of the historic Olde Towne East neighborhood and an easy five-minute drive from Downtown Columbus. This is a transitional area, and not the best area of town, but it has never felt unsafe in the last 1.5 years that we've lived and worked nearby. You may get some street noise from Main St. Located in a secure brick 4-unit apartment building.

“Very clean and well stocked condo style duplex home. It’s not in a lavish n
neighborhood_overview:
Olde Towne East is one of Columbus’ most historic districts. This is a gentrifying neighborhood where beautiful, old buildings meet the vibrancy of modern-day living. Coffee shops, independent stores and lovely restaurants all sit happily alongside each other, and are just a 10 minute walk from the house.

This is a transitional area still in the revitalization phase, but it has never felt unsafe in the last 1.5 years that we've lived and worked nearby. If you are looking for an upscale neighborhood with posh shops and boutiques, this is probably not the right listing for you. We'd be happy to point you in the right direction :)

Olde Towne East is very popular with residents due to its close proximity to Downtown. Hop in an UBER and you’ll be no further than 5 to 10 minutes from any address in Downtown, making this a perfect apartment for business travelers too. Free street parking is available if you are driving yourself.

We’re also located close to the
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!

host_about:
Bruce and I are retired and enjoying time together and with family.  I like gardening and cooking and having friends over and we are very active in the community.  

We are returning to AirBNB, after a hiatus of 3 years spent building and finishing this new home  Reviews prior to 2019 are from our "Little church on the alley".We can be about as involved as guests would like - from "here you are, have a nice stay" - to cooking dinner. Guests are free to enjoy the garden and patio - watch the chickens.

We really try to host folk who need longer stays - weeks to months, hence the 30 day minimum,  but that sometimes leaves a few days between bookings - often  on weekends. So feel free to inquire about shorter stays at short notice. 
 
We have traveled quite a lot and usually stay at Airbnb sites - so much nicer than fancy hotels. 

This asks for languages I speak, but the list does not allow me to claim, American and English/Australian as different.

description:
Welcome to the cutest little bungalow in the heart of Columbus! Our fully remodeled home features 4 bedrooms, open concept living with a fully stocked kitchen, private back patio, parking and wifi. You will not want to leave this cutie! Enjoy walking or biking the Olentangy trail and park of roses, and all the amazing restaurants just outside your door. In a short drive you will have access to everything Columbus has to offer, OSU, NHL, Crew SC, German Village, Short North just to name a few.

The space
This 1940's bungalow, nick named The Clintonville Cutie, just went under a full renovation in 2021 to make this home the most comfortable, cozy, and quiet get away for a work trip, weekend get away for you and your special someone, your family, or girls weekend. Each space in our home was planned with your comfort in mind, truly your home away from home. High end bedding, appliances, furnishings and features. Our kitchen is completely stocked for you to cook a f
neighborhood_overview:
Clintonville is an adorable neighborhood that is extremely quiet, walkable, friendly, safe, and very family oriented. There are so many great restaurants just around the corner from the house; North star Cafe, Jeni's ice cream, Hot Chicken Take Over, Fusion, Ritzy's, Galo's, Crimson Cup, just to name a few. Just down the street is the Olentangy trail that connects so many neighborhoods to the downtown Columbus area. Then there is the beautiful park of roses you just have to see for yourself. Looking for things to do while in Columbus, here are some of our favorites that you can check out in just a short drive from Clintonville:
Columbus Zoo
Columbus Art Museum
Franklin Park Conservatory
Easton town center for shopping
Short North
German Village
The Ohio State University
The Scioto Mile
The North Market
Cosi
Zoombezi Bay
Top Golf
Pins Mechanical
Bridge Park in Dublin
host_about: Hi! We are Susan & Joe and we are so excited to be hosting our first Airbnb! I (Susan) am a high school art teacher and mother of 2 amazing girls. I absolutely love art, photography, interior design and traveling. Joe is a private contractor who is one amazing cook and loves to travel as well. We just got married in June of 2021 and are so excited to venture into the world of hosting our first Airbnb together! We have been staying in Airbnb's together for the last four years as much as we can,  from fun little staycations right in the heart of central Ohio to visiting familiar and new cities we've never been. We truly enjoying all the little gems we find here and exploring the cities they are in! We can't wait to share our little gem with you!

neighborhood_overview: The Short North is a hip, culture-rich area centered on N high Street. Contemporary galleries fill converted warehouses, and the Wexner Center for the Arts hosts boundary-pushing exhibitions. Shops selling records, streetwear, and vintage clothes are interersed with student-packed coffehouses, craft-beer bars, and casual eateries. Programming at Short North Stage spans musicals and cutting-edge drama. Enjoy endless mimosas and a boutique like brunch at Forno Kitchen and bar. Enjoy the most tasty coffee in all of Columbus at Northstar Cafe. Enjoy a fantastic steak with fine dining to match at Hyde Park. If more low scale is your thing, but your wanting steak. Ruth's Chris is a short drive away. Maybe a gourmet burger is more your style, you can make sure to enjoy one by going to Bareburger. Maybe in the mood for Italian? Martini Modern Italian has you covered and is less than 10 minutes away from the condo. Another amazing dinning option is The Guild House with their unique rustic-moder
host_about: My name is Jordan Ferguson, I’m the CEO of Home Is Where The Heart Is. What I want for all my guests is simple, I want to create an experience that they never forget. When they think of Columbus, we want them to think of us. We’re a home away from home for a few and an escape from the hustle n bustle of the city. How is this possible you might ask? Well simply because home is where the heart is.

The apartment features a bright and airy bohemian beach feel with sun-filled rooms, stylish décor and comfortable furnishings throughout.

Stay just minutes to Downtown Columbus & Short North and just a short 4-min walk to Starbucks. You couldn't be better located to experience everything the city has to offer with FREE parking!

The space

neighborhood_overview:
This historic neighborhood of German Village with its cobblestone roads, tree lined streets, beautiful brick homes, cute coffee shops, and awesome food and bars is where you want to be when visiting Columbus.

The apartment is right in the heart of German Village facing Livingston Ave that is full of lively entertainment and dining options and home to one of the nation's largest independent bookstores.

It is further enhanced by the historic & beautiful 23-acre Schiller Park, which has the lovely Huntington Garden, dozens of mature oak trees, a pond, tennis courts, picnic area, and people walking their dogs.

Just across the road from the apartment is the Nationwide Children’s Hospital. Get your morning coffee fix at the Starbucks an easy 3-minute walk away as well as a large supermarket only 15 mins down the road.

Check yourself in at any time via the keypad, cook up a storm in the full kitchen, take a long hot shower in the updated bathroom, and then sink into soft queen-beds for the night.

✔ Easy highway access
✔ Fully equipped kitchen
✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi
✔ 2 Cozy Bedrooms
✔ Spacious living area

The space
Our apartment is located in the historic Olde Towne East neighborhood and an easy five-minute drive from Downtown Columbus. This is a transitional area, but it has never felt unsafe in the last 2 years that we've lived and worked nearby. You may get some street noise from Main St. Located in a secure brick 8-unit townhouse building right nearby the major highways.

You’ll enter the property using a deadbolt keypad on the front door.
host_about: I came to Columbus from Raleigh in 2019 with the intention of bringing properties and people to life. My partner Marc and I started hosting travelers at well-located properties, and fell in love with the creativity and stewardship that came with it. I value the opportunity to have a positive touch on someone's day no matter what they might be going through. We've faced many challenges, but are constantly learning and improving. The Tailwind Team and I work hard to be a vehicle for others to enjoy life-changing experiences!
