Prime location, top finishes and spacious layout with contemporary feel in our home. Park and walking trail just one street away. It's a quick Uber ride from the CMH Airport and downtown. Easy sleeps 6. Enjoy all Columbus has to offer.

The space
We are travelling professionals and prepared this house for the comfortable stay and work like we would like to work and travel.

Our mattresses are new or brand new, and the linens are minimum 300 thread counts. All towels are high quality, soft and fluffy. We provided the assortment of pillows with different firmness of your liking. All bedrooms have room darkening curtains in case if you work nights. Alarm clocks and USB chargers provided as well.

Each bedroom has a closet with hangers. Additional storage space is available in the finished basement.

Our charming Victorian house is the perfect spot to stay on your trip to Columbus! Enjoy an amazing location, better located than most hotels. Steps from the Short North and Italian Village, and a few minutes from Downtown Columbus. The king master suite has lots of space to spread out, and an amazing bathroom! The space
The grand first floor has soaring ceilings, and is an inviting space to enjoy. A large kitchen/dinning room, living room, and a bedroom with full bed, + twin daybed. Also on the first floor is a half bath, and laundry room. Upstairs is a master suite with a king bed and memory foam mattress. This room has a mounted smart TV. The master bath is huge, with a soak tub, and shower.

The space
Designed & hosted by Made Simple Corporate Housing, this 950 sq. ft historic condo is filled with so many thoughtful touches. This space is meant for those who want to live comfortably while away from their home; whether it is a couple, a group of friends (max. 4 people), or just a single traveler. There is one bedroom with a king-sized bed and one sofa couch in the living room, which converts into a queen-sized bed. The garage is detached and is located right behind the condo. The front patio is set up for those looking to enjoy some fresh air and relaxation. I

description:
Newly remodeled 2-bedroom, 1 bath townhouse style apartment in the Salem Village neighborhood. It is well located to be convenient and quick to great places in Columbus! The space
This newly remodeled 2-bedroom and 1 bath comes fully furnished with new queen beds in each room, and a new couch for you to relax with the RokuTV. The townhouse comes with WiFi as well, so if you need to "work from home" there won't be an issue!

Guest access
The unit has it's own parking spot for your car or rental car, and there is plenty of street parking available. If you don't have a car, Uber and Lyft are great alternatives!

name: King Bed | FREE Off-Street Parking | Close to OSU
description:
This apartment is nestled in the historic neighborhood of Victorian Village. It boasts a vintage vibe and loads of character. You are 1 minute walking distance to many restaurants, cafe's, & shops on High Street. Book our place and have free off-street parking during your entire stay via our private parking lot. Check-in at your convenience via our smart lock and have all the comforts of home at your fingertips —including fast wifi, a fully stocked kitchen, and other thoughtful amenities.

Dogs under 30lbs permitted on case by case basis. $35/dog per night. Notify us at booking.

NOTE: There is construction activity within the building through the end of 2021.

The space
We are doing everything we can to make sure your stay is as clean and safe as possible. If you have any questions about our cleaning methods or request anything special, do not hesitate to reach out!

This is a one-bedroom Airbnb in a fantastic location -but t
neighborhood_overview: "The Victorian Village is known for quaint, leafy streets lined with late-19th- and early-20th-century homes in a variety of architectural styles, such as Gothic Revival mansions, Second Empire villas, and Queen Anne houses. Paths crisscross sprawling Goodale Park, a setting for annual music festivals. Overlooking the park, the Pizzuti Collection hosts contemporary art exhibitions and has a free sculpture garden."
host_about:
Hello, and welcome to your home away from home! 

Chad and Victoria here. We both live and work in Columbus, having both graduated from The Ohio State University. We love everything about the city, the vibrant surrounding neighborhoods and are so happy you chose to visit us. 

The Short North has been a very special part of our story together.  We got engaged at Goodale Park, which is a short and highly recommended walk away. We got our start as a young married couple living just a stone’s throw away from this residence. 

We're a couple passionate about our city and also traveling the world. Whether we are scootering around Columbus, jet-skiing in Costa Rica, off roading in Aruba, or cruising up Highway 1 in a convertible in California - we want to be fully present in the culture and surroundings we find ourselves in. Columbus is our hometown and we want you to love it as much as we do! 

If we're not using our travel points to fly somewhere around the globe, you'll find Chad training for his next half marathon or scouting out an epic new pizza to try. Victoria on the other hand was a 2x All American NCAA Champion rower at The Ohio State University and a proud plant and dog mom. We are passionate about being physically active and love getting outside to explore! We are working on our goal of knocking out all of the U.S. National Parks, and are making progress on the globe scratch-off map we got for our first Christmas together. 

Relationships, like community, are very important to us. Our philosophy is every guest is a part of our “family” once they choose to stay in one of our Airbnbs. Columbus is our home, and we hope even for the short duration of your stay with us that it feels like your home too. Please do not hesitate to reach out with any questions during your stay. 

We hope the time in our space gives you a glimpse of life in Columbus! Thank you for choosing to stay with us!

We made a list of the urban hotspots that are steps from your front door!

name: ⭐️ Sam’s Spot ⭐️Near Expo Center 🐎 OSU & Short North
description:
Enjoy this centrally located, spacious unit of our updated duplex with a location in the best of both worlds. Tucked right between the popular Short North and OSU campus, you can enjoy your morning coffee on our breezy front porch with a view of the neighborhood while listening to the birds sing and the kids playing down the street. Or take a stroll around the neighborhood and pick out a café or restaurant to visit, Sam’s Spot is less than 1 mile to OSU's campus, the Short North, and 4th street.

The space
Built in 1915, our newly re-furnished duplex offers a spacious gathering area for friends and family. While not renovated from top to bottom, the house was partially renovated and updated in 2021 and rest assured, our furnishings are new and clean!

The space has been updated with modern, smart, and tech-friendly features. Some of which include a smart thermostat, smart Fire TVs, touch-on bedside table lamps (no more fumbling in the dark for a chain or
neighborhood_overview:
Weinland Park has tons of bars, restaurants, and coffee shops within walking distance or just a short drive/Uber. Sidewalks make navigating the neighborhood a breeze. Weinland Park is a development success story. The area is designated as an opportunity zone, helping to spur the revitalization of the historic neighborhood.
Budd Dairy Food Hall (5 min. walk) is a must-visit during your time in Columbus! A brand new business that offers nine different menus from local vendors, as well as multiple bars, including one on the rooftop patio.
host_about: I grew up in a small town in Ohio, but I moved to Columbus for school and have been here ever since! I have a strong desire for travel, but I also love just exploring Columbus, spending time with friends and family, and making adventures out of the city I live in. Feel free to reach out for local suggestions or tips for having the best time in Columbus!

description:

The space
Perfect for a weekend getaway with friends, family, business trips, and individuals traveling for events that are always being held in the German Village area, Short North & Columbus Area.

neighborhood_overview:
Historic German Village Neighborhood, right outside of downtown Columbus. Walkable to downtown as well as shopping, coffee shops, restaurants, and bars.

Right, when you step outside our Lovely house you will be steps away from S 3rd Street. As you start to walk left you are steps away from Chapman's Eat Market, The Book Loft, Hausfrau Haven, Stauf's Coffee, Tiki Botanicals, Winans Chocolates, and many more!

The neighborhood is one mile from Mapfre Stadium, two miles from Ohio State's campus, three miles from the short north, and four miles from Downtown. Bars within a 5-minute walk from the Big Blue House include the Rambling House and Rumba Cafe. Alternatively, you can take a walk to Glen Echo Park, one of Columbus's most beautiful parks. Clintonville restaurants and shops are just a half-mile away as well.

There are 2 Free Parking Spots located in the driveway.

description:
Enjoy a calm & relaxing stay in our 2 bed/1.5 bath stand alone home in Clintonville's quiet Northmoor neighborhood. Perfect location for families offering countless local restaurants/breweries/bars, vintage shopping, hiking/biking, and Whetstone Park's complete 150 acre facility of natural beauty and community amenities. Quick drive to OSU Campus/Wexner Medical Center, Riverside Hospital, Columbus Convention Center, Short North and Columbus Crew/Bluejacket/Clippers sporting events.

The space
Consider yourself home in this MCM design driven ranch with many original unique features as well as new furniture and appliances throughout. Equipped for comfort and function the house offers a large open living and work space. Feel free to cook and eat at home. Stainless steel appliances flank the granite countertops while highlighting the kitchen's original cabinetry stocked with organic ingredients and green cleaning supplies. Dine in our spacious dining room with seatin
neighborhood_overview:
-Whetstone Park in Clintonville is a Columbus landmark and you have direct access to this park that includes bike trails, baseball fields and tennis courts, a pond, ravine, library and recreation facility, as well as the 13-acre (5.3 ha) Columbus Park of Roses. Opened in 1952, the Park of Roses is a frequent site for weddings and special events. In June, the Park of Roses hosts its annual "Rose Festival." During summer months concerts featuring many of Columbus' brass bands are held every Sunday evening at the Park's gazebo. Whetstone Park also hosts an annual Fourth of July fireworks display for the Clintonville community.
-The Clintonville Farmer’s Market has it all, from bison and sausage to certified organic fruits and vegetables. Unlike other farmer’s markets, Clintonville’s producers are mostly food based, but there are a few craft vendors here and there. Catch the market between late April and early November for one of the most lively markets in the city.
-A unique fea

This neighborhood is thriving with students and young adults working from their porch, walking to and from High St, lounging on the grass of their front yards, and enjoying all sorts of outdoor activities.

name: Vibrant Studio by High St w/ Free Parking & WiFi!
description:
Stay just steps from Ohio State campus & the popular High St and only minutes from all the unique experiences of the University District & the Short North.

The building is right in the heart of OSU student living so expect noise from nearby parties & events.

This vibrant studio has everything you need for a comfortable stay with a bright, open layout, a chic living area with a Smart TV, a mini kitchen, a workspace with fast WiFi and a sparkling bathroom with all the essentials provided.

The space
Make your way inside using the easy keyless lock and into your vibrant home away from home right in the heart of all the action.

Please NOTE: This is a 23-unit apartment building. There will be some noise from other guests. Dumpsters are located in the alleyway behind the building and can be messy at times.

Relax in the living area by the window with two plush chairs that sit opposite the 50” Smart TV loaded with all your fav
neighborhood_overview:
If you are looking for a true college experience then this is it! The studio is located right in the heart of The Ohio State University campus which makes for a great central location throughout Columbus.

This neighborhood is thriving with students and young adults working from their porch, walking to and from High St, lounging on the grass of their front yards, and enjoying all sorts of outdoor activities.

Walk to the nearby Newport Music Hall, South Campus of Ohio State and just a 5 minute Uber ride to all the top restaurants, great shopping and top nightlife of the lively Short North and Downtown areas.

Leave the car parked and wander over to High St just a 4 minute walk away where you will find numerous restaurants, bars, breweries, event centers, and cafes all right on your doorstep.

Huge modern eat-in kitchen, separate dining & living rooms, 2 private bedrooms & 2 full bathrooms. Covered porch w/swing & rear patio w/outdoor dining area.

The space
This listing is for an entire 2-story 2br/2ba residential house. The main entrance is off a large covered side porch with a quaint porch swing. There's also a rear patio with a large outdoor dining table & chairs.

neighborhood_overview:
Historic German Village is a quaint old-line neighborhood with brick-streets on the southern edge of Downtown Columbus. Full of preserved and updated 19th-century homes, old brick and stone sidewalks, cafes, pubs, parks and more, it's a joy to stroll on foot.

Be sure to check out nearby well-known dining options like Brown Bag Deli, The Olde Mohawk, Schmidt's Sausage Haus, Lindey's, Stauf's Coffee, and Pistacia Vera.

Take a walk through Schiller Park and watch the ducks in the lake there.

Catch an Uber or use an electric scooter to visit all that Downtown Columbus has to offer!

• Private Patio
• Complimentary coffee
• Washer & dryer w/detergent & dryer sheets
• Decorations throughout for like-home feel

The space
When you enter the home, you will walk into an open living and dining room setup that houses a cozy couch and designer accent chairs facing a brand new 65” TV and a cute dining table nestled under a dimmable light to set the mood however you like. As you enter the kitchen you will see a brand new experience with granite countertops, tile backsplash, stainless steel appliances and dish and cook ware for your use. Wh
neighborhood_overview:
This walkable, bikeable neighborhood, a short 1.5 miles from downtown Columbus and it’s major highways, is one of Columbus’ most coveted areas. A hybrid of urban flair and neighborhood warmth, Grandview’s vibes are at the same time laid-back and buzzing with energy. Stroll the wide, tree-lined sidewalks of Grandview Ave amid the hum of cafe-table chatter.

Discover specialized independent shops, curated New-York style boutiques, a chocolatier’s gorgeous handmade truffles, independent breweries, top-rated coffee roasters, cutting-edge salons, and of course, world-class restaurants that use fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. The electric mix of restaurants here have consistently been recognized by critics and diners alike for their cuisine, ambience, and outstanding attention to detail. Grandview is also home to a collection of award-winning craft microbreweries and taprooms.

A hub of creative culture and out-of-the-ordinary experiences, Grandview offers an array
host_about:
Hello, my name is Joe - I was born and raised in Ohio and love Airbnb which means you’ll receive high service and quality, local recommendations to make the most of your trip. Feel free to instantly book or message me, I’m happy to answer any specific questions in advance.

By day, I’m a consultant. 
By night, I’m a friends/family man and an Ohio sports junkie. 

I’m a well traveled Airbnb guest and have pulled a lot of inspiration from other properties so I know what great hosts should do to create a comfortable guest experience. Be sure to ask me about a few of my favorite things on our welcome sheet.

Make yourself at home!

Make yourself at home in this luxe boho modern one-bedroom loft.

Sip on your choice of a tasty hot cup of coffee, tea or chocolate in front of a 55in HD crystal clear smart Roku TV. Enjoy boho touches of greens and browns throughout this modern black and white apartment. Get all the cozy and comfy feels in this well-located loft.

The space
This modern boho space is designed for resting and recharging during your travel. The perfect stay for couples, best friends, business professionals, Ohio State family, alumni and more. We do not host parties, events, or any loud get togethers at this unit due to the nature of the shared wall with neighbors.

Guest access
Our one-bedroom apartment is furnished with the comfiest queen bed, a vibrant couch, and a cozy queen-sized air mattress. It has everything you could imagine to enjoy your stay in the Buckeye State! Want to cook
neighborhood_overview:
Great and diverse location less than 5 minutes away from the shopping center, restaurants, fun activities and more! Also within a 10-20 minute drive of almost everywhere else you’d want and need to be:

10 minutes from John Glenn Airport
9 minutes from Mount Carmel East
18 minutes from Ohio State University
14 minutes from Easton
15 minutes from Downtown Columbus
15 minutes from Convention Center
17 minutes from Nationwide Children’s
16 minutes from Ohio Expo Center & State Fair
15 minutes from Columbus Museum of Art

We hope you make yourself at home here. Please let us know if you have any questions :)
host_about: We have grown to love Columbus and it’s quirks and are more than happy to be able to provide you a home away from home. We love to travel both domestically and internationally. Our goal is always to make our lofts comfortable, cozy and clean with a vibrant aesthetic and personality just as if we were staying ourselves.

Enjoy this 2 bedroom 2 bathroom escape located 5 minutes from Easton. With complementary bottle of wine, breakfast & beverages along with hookah. Here you will have everything thing you need . Make this Your home away from home . Enjoy 2 TV’s while relaxing with a glass of wine streaming Netflix . Shopping Restaurants fast food , movie theaters all less than 5 mins Away including Easton mall , Walmart Target and many more . Enjoy some of your favorite restaurants including BJ’s J Alexander’s Chick-fil-A and more. You’re in the perfect spot for it all .

name: Very spacious, King bed & futon, private bathroom
description:
Beautiful Queen Anne Home in the heart of Old Towne East with excellent food, bars and shops within walking distance, and plenty of free on-street parking. The Museum of Modern Art, Franklin Park Conservatory and Botanical Gardens, CoSi, and Convention Center are all within 3 miles, and THE Ohio State University is only a 10 minute drive. Guest space is a private floor with each room having its own bathroom. Feel free to enjoy the seating area with a pond and fire pit in the backyard.

The space
This stylish and spacious room is a perfect place to stay for group trips and/or long term-stays. The room can sleep up to six with a King size bed, Full size futon, and an accessible loft with an air mattress. The private bathroom is fully stocked, has heated floors and is only accessible within the room. Living room-like area is perfect for long term guests who like a separate space to eat, relax, or watch TV on a 55" 4K FireTV with HBO Max, Prime Video, Netflix, Hulu
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful Queen Anne Homes with amazing parks, bars and restaurants all within walking distance, and Upper Cup Coffee and Hang-over Easy are two breakfast staples to get you recharged and ready for the next round!  Nationwide Children's Hospital only a 5-minute drive.

description:
This newly renovated, beautiful 1300 square feet single family home is nestled right in the heart of Grandview. Walking distance to a wide range of restaurants and shops, there is plenty to do within a stones throw. Positioned a short drive from most of the main hotspots in Columbus.

Relax in the backyard in the spacious screened in patio. Enjoy time with friends & family playing games and catching up… place complete with a poker table
& dart board. Off street parking in the garage out back.

The space
Fifth Ave possesses all that you’ll ever need in regards to convenience items, restaurant tractions and local shops. A short walk from the home :)

Guest access
Guests have access to the whole home. There is a covered two car garage outback as well as a large screened in patio.

Located on a corner lot in a quiet, Worthington neighborhood, it’s just minutes from the Columbus Zoo, Ohio State University, downtown Columbus and so much more! Enjoy a fresh cup of coffee from the Keurig Coffee maker while spending time with friends or family in the living room watching the 55” Smart TV. **ABSOLUTELY NO PARTIES OR EVENTS** No smoking inside the property. Please see house rules.

The space
All 3 bedrooms are very spacious and have queen beds. Towels, bed linens, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, shampoo and body wash, a basic cooking set and utensils are just a few of the many items included in your stay. Cozy & quiet!

Located just 6 minutes from downtown.. this sleek, quite bungalow is nestled-away from the hustle & bustle yet still close to everything Columbus has to offer. Perfect for short or long-term stays, this single family standalone home includes lots of comforts of home to ensure your comfort all-throughout, and boasts a large fully-enclosed yard with privacy fence making it a fantastic option for kids & pets, and an affordable option for traveling families.

The space
Two bedrooms containing 3 total beds, large sectional couch, cleaning living space and charming decor all-throughout. Includes washer & dryer, dishwasher, dining table, 2 HDTV's, premium memory foam mattresses, Central AC and so much more.

neighborhood_overview: Quiet! Getting a great night's sleep is never a problem in this section of the neighborhood. Located in Franklinton, which is one the fastest growing communities in the Columbus area and we've enjoyed being a part of the revitalization for the past several years. In a short time, Franklinton has shown what a charismatic suburb it truly is as it's enjoyed by all walks of life.
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!
